script:
C'mon!
 Running like a fugitive,
 Being chased by something
 Inside my heart is pounding
 My throat dry like it's withering
 For no single one,
 To none does belong,
 This time is ours, right now...
 Unraveling the pain,
 Unraveling our hearts,
 Unraveling shadows
 Stifling our breath,
 Reaching for beyond,
 Tearing through the dark
 In fighting and in love
 To the distant light above,
 Yes, we are on the way
 I wanna rock...
 Rockin' my heart
 This is good!
 Bit by bit,I'm figuring out the timing...
 He read my movement.
 No way could he do that!
 Darn! 					We were so close...!
 Naruto, can you still move?
 Of course! I'm totally fine!
 He's pretty much spent...and it's no wonder.
 Shadow Clone Jutsu usesa lot of Chakra.
 But thanks to him, we found our way out.
 I found the way to break through!
 Hah! Impossible!
 That was just a coincidence.
 Naruto! Run!
 Run out of here andattack from the outside!
 A-All right!
 You won't be able to…!
 I-I'm not going to lose!
 There!
 Fire Style: Fire Ball Jutsu!
 Darn!
 T-That was good just now!
 What?
 We're doing it one more time!
 All right!
 It's likely that there's a limitto that guy's Chakra, too!
 To prove that,he's little by little…
 This won't go as you've planned.
 First, I'll get you!
 Sasuke!
 Darn! It's been a while sinceI've fought in such bad conditions.
 And I'm worried aboutSasuke and Naruto, too...
 Be calm…Think...What will he come after?
 Oh no!
 What?!
 Too late!
 The Broken Seal
 That was Sakura's voice!
 Did something happen?
 What's that Kakashi doing?
 Sa…kura…
 Darn it… I must do something…
 I'll do something about it…
 T-This guy...
 Here I go…
 It's pointless to struggle.
 Naruto, behind you!!
 Naruto!
 It's impossible for youto get out of here.
 I mean it.
 Can you stand up, Naruto?
 Y-Yeah…
 From now on,don't waste your Chakra!
 You're playing right into his hands.
 I know.
 Darn it!
 If things continue like this,it's going to be really bad.
 I...
 I have to do something.
 Strangely, my eyes have adjusted…
 It's about the time I putan end to this for you…
 What?!
 Stand up, you idiot!
 I'm aiming for a vital spot...but he's parrying all of them .
 I know…you're so persistent!
 A coincidence…No, that's not it.
 On the contrary, he's fightingwhile covering for his friend.
 Surely, my movements…
 That boy…he can see something.
 What in the world...?
 Okay, in that case...
 He disappeared.
 Where, where did he disappear to?!
 Naruto! Don't faint!
 I can't take care of youany more than I am now!
 Who asked you to take care of me...
 It seems that kid hasreached his limits.
 Tsk...
 Amazing…That's an amazing move.
 You move well…
 Wha--?!
 But I'll stop youwith the next one.
 Motor function...
 Reflexes...Ability to judge a situation...
 All of these things…should be at their limits!
 He's coming!
 Calm down…
 Focus!
 And … 					See everything!
 He saw through absolutely everything?!
 No way…
 Those eyes…
 It can't be…
 Sharingan…
 You are…
 Only a little, but...
 I was able to see!
 So, you also have the powerof Kekkei Genkai…
 What a kid…
 It's not perfect yet,
 but to think that in the middle of a battlehe was able to rouse this power…
 If that's the case,I can't fight him too long…
 This Jutsu uses a lot of Chakra.
 There are also limits to retainingthe teleportation speed.
 Besides, the longer the fight continues,
 the more my movements will enterinto the range of his "reading."
 In fact, his eyeshave already captured me.
 It would be foolish to aimstraight at him.
 In that case…
 I'll use that kid to lure him in!
 What?!
 Let me make it in time!
 K-Kakashi Sensei!
 You were late enteringto guard, Kakashi.
 Your whole-hearted intent to helpthose kids has gone to your head,
 and it seems to have cloudedyour Sharingan
 with even heavier fog.
 Even though you havethose impressive eyes,
 your ability to read your enemy'smovements is getting cloudy.
 Amuse me more, Kakashi…
 I want to repay my debt inan amusing way.
 Don't worry. Anytime now,Haku is going to defeat those kids.
 You better apologize to themin tears
 when you are in "the next world"for your lack of strength.
 Sasuke will be defeated…?
 That's not true!
 Sasuke is…
 Cha!
 Not by that guy!
 Cha!
 He won't be defeated!
 Cha!
 Naruto won't either!
 That's right.
 Huh!
 I...believe in their strength.
 Naruto is the Number One Hyperactive,Knucklehead Ninja…
 And Sasuke is a member ofthe most excellent clan
 in the Hidden Leaf Village!
 That can't be!
 Yes…His name is Sasuke Uchiha…
 He bears within his body...
 the famous Kekkei Genkaiof the Uchiha clan!
 He's a Ninja genius.
 He's the remaining survivorof that tragic clan?!
 No wonder he grows so quickly.
 But...
 That's the same as Haku.
 Nobody has ever beatenthat secret Jutsu of Haku's
 Not one person in the past…
 Well then…
 It's about time I settled this too, huh.
 Sakura, don't move from here.
 Uh... ah…okay!
 No, I'm going to putan end to this!
 For God's sake, you…
 just won't quit…dragging my feet, will you?
 You did it! 					Sasuke...!
 W-What kind of expressionis that…
 You…idiot…!
 W-Why?!
 You protected me…?!
 How the hell…should I know?
 Sasuke...! Sasuke...! Sasuke...!
 Hmph…
 You...
 I hated you…
 Why? Why…?
 Why…me…?
 I didn't ask for your help!!
 I don't know…
 My body moved…of its own accord…
 Fool…!
 Sasuke!
 That man…
 Until I defeated…my brother…
 I absolutely refused to die...
 That's what I decided, but...
 You, don't die…
 He…
 To protect someone dear to him…
 he would plunge inknowing it was a trap…
 He's a Shinobi worthy of respect.
 Is this the first time you faceda friend's death?
 This is the way of the Shinobi…
 Shut up!
 Even though I...hated you too…
 I won't forgive you…
 I'm going to kill you!
 What is this Chakra?!
 It can't be…
 For Chakras to be tangible like that…
 A-And…what a ghastly Chakra that is…
 The wound on his hand…lt's healing instantly…
 This boy…
 Who in hell is he…?
 Is it Zabuza…?
 No!
 This sinister Chakra was once…
 It can't be!
 What is…this Chakra?
 It feels foul…
 Kakashi?No, it's too big to be Kakashi's…
 Who is it?
 Naruto…!
 Oh no…
 At the time like this…
 The seal has broken…?
 I have to hurry!
 He's coming!
 How dare you!
 You ruined Sasuke!Damn you!
 Sasuke's dream…
 What about dream?!
 Darn you! Darn you! Darn you!
 Because of your dream…!
 Next time: "The White Past: Hidden Ambition"

script:
Summoning Jutsu!
 Oh, long time no see.
 We don’t have much timeto get nostalgic.
 We’ve got a mission.
 That I see over thereis the Village of Artisans, isn’t it?
 Yeah. It’s a village of professionalswho develop Ninja tools.
 The exceptional Ninja toolsthey develop are also
 supplied to usin the Five Great Nations…
 But there’s beena strange rumor recently.
 A strange rumor?
 Something about them developingthe ultimate weapon
 and attempting to antagonizethe Five Great Nations.
 In other words, we shouldsearch the village and…
 verify whether or notthere is that ultimate weapon, right?
 That’s about the size of it.
 Piece of cake.
 Fly into the wavy and twisted sky,into your hands
 The distance created between usbecame too big,
 because we were always together
 Your honest reply, “See you…”
 coming from that brash mouthmakes it sadder.
 If you are in an unfamiliar town, crying
 Then I want to deliver you a smile,even if I’m not by your side
 Fly into the wavy and twisted sky,into your hands
 I can feel it so close,
 Our two hearts
 Hey! Something strange is going on.
 What is it?!
 There’s not a soul in the village!
 I also found something terribleon top of that.
 What?!
 It’s that.
 The coffin of Seimei, the founder ofthe Village of Artisans.
 Even his body is…
 This is serious.
 The artisans abandoned their village.Where in the world did they go?
 The Targeted Shukaku
 I’m hungry, I’m hungry!
 Maybe I’ll treat myself and havetwo eggs in my ramen today.
 Huh?
 What’s going on there?!
 Did I keep you waiting by any chance?
 Not really. I just got here a bit before.
 That’s good… Then, here.
 I made sure to hand it to you.
 Yeah, yeah. What a pain.
 Just a minute!
 What’re you guys doing…
 all in secret in a place like thiswithout even asking me?!
 –Naruto? 					–Huh?
 You’re terrible, just terrible, Sakura!
 Here you won’t even go outon a date with me at all!
 Why're you talking gibberishall of a sudden?
 Ouch-ouch-ouch-ouch…
 An errand for the Old Lady?
 Yes. It seems a new poisonwas discovered or something.
 I delivered a list ofresearch medicinal substance
 for Shikamaru’s father to prepare.
 Oh, that’s it?!
 Jeez, you jump to conclusions.
 Oh, come to think of it,
 an update report from Temarihas been delivered to Lady Tsunade.
 An update report?
 So? What exactly?
 I heard that the Village Hidden inthe Sand started Ninja education,
 imitating the curriculum programof the Leaf’s.
 It seems that Temari and her brothersare working as instructors.
 Instructors?!
 Is that harsh woman fit to besomething like an instructor…?
 Really? That Gaara, huh…?
 This is hands-on training.
 Choose from among thesea Ninja tool that suits you.
 What is it?
 Do we absolutely have to choose?!
 What do you mean?
 We’ll end up hurting the other personif we use a weapon.
 We might kill them.
 A weapon is…
 No, never mind…
 A mission isn’t a game.
 If you were to enter a field of battlewith that frame of mind, you'd die.
 I-I’m sorry.
 You got Gaara angry becauseyou ask stupid questions.
 You are in trouble.
 The three of us will conducthands-on training.
 Gather in the respective classof your choice.
 Gaara, put a smile on!
 They'll get scared and nobody willchoose you with that sulky look.
 My dad said that Gaarawas the Sand’s ultimate weapon.
 Yeah. He's so powerful that the villagewould be destroyed, if he got mad.
 He’s scary, so let’s not bother.
 All right, I’m with Temari.
 I’ll be with Kankuro!
 – Me too! 					– Me too!
 – Me too! 					– Me too!
 Please be my teacher.
 Earlier, he was trying toteach me something…
 Excuse me… Please be my teacher.
 Are you okay with me?
 Please teach me!
 This is cool.
 That’s too big!
 I’ll take this.
 What’s your name?
 I’m Matsuri.
 Matsuri, choose a weapon.
 What’s the matter?
 Come at me with that weaponwith the intent to kill me.
 Yes, sir…
 They say an ogre with Iron Clubis invincible. But you are no ogre.
 Yes, sir. Please tell mewhat I should choose.
 The weapon called the Rope Javelin.
 Rope Javelin…
 The sharp blade on the end of the rope
 is to keep an enemy out of one's reach,rather than for attack.
 And you seal off an enemy’s movementwith the rope.
 Practice until you can control itas a part of your body.
 Yes, sir!
 Damn. Who are you guys?!
 Is this allthe Sand Village Shinobi have?
 Wait.
 Leave this guy alive.We can use him to draw that one out.
 Hang in there! What is it?!What happened?
 Take me to Gaara… Quickly.
 What’s the matter?
 My mother and father were hit withcountless weapons right in front of me.
 So I…
 For what purposedo you hold a weapon?
 He…
 What are…
 …these two to you?!
 Th-These guys are…
 …my friends!
 Try laying so much asanother finger on them!
 I’ll clobber you!
 He said that to me.
 That’s what we’re after: Gaara.
 Gaara, we werejust coming to get you.
 The patrol Ninja wasattacked by somebody.
 Guys calling themselvesThe Four Celestials
 brandishing strange weapons,said to tell Gaara that…
 "We declare a challenge to you,the ultimate weapon.
 "If you don’t accept the challenge,
 "we will take away one personclose to you every day…
 "and they shallpay the price for you."
 You there.
 Are you Gaara’s student?
 You shall be the first sacrifice.
 What’s this Rope Javelin?!
 Wait!
 The enemy went northeast…
 Matsuri has become a first sacrifice…
 But the real target of the guys whocall themselves the Four Celestials is…
 you, Gaara.
 Yeah…
 This must be brought toa Jonin Council at once…
 In the northeastern direction
 where the ones who call themselvesthe Four Celestials left,
 there is the Village Hidden in the Leavesof the Land of Fire,
 with the Land of Riverssandwiched between.
 Therefore, we will be requestingthe assistance of the Leaf…
 Temari, Kankuro, Gaara.
 Form a unit and prepare forpursuit immediately.
 Hold it.
 The enemy is after Gaara.
 That would be like walkingright into a trap they laid.
 That’s right.Why won’t you send a party?!
 It might be a diversionary tacticby the enemy.
 The village will become shorthandedif we send out pursuers.
 Then you at least couldcome with us, right, Baki?!
 Most likely, the enemy isafter Shukaku.
 Gaara is the Sand’s ultimate weapon.
 If we know that…
 But it's also a dangerousdouble-edged sword to the village.
 If they would do us the favorfacing each other and perishing…
 Then at leastI should go with them.
 No. You have a different mission.
 Just send those three!
 Hey, how about it?!
 I’ve been givena different mission, you see…
 Go. She’s your student, right?
 Let’s go, Kankuro.
 Will it be okay with her?!
 She’s just a kid.
 Will he come?!
 If he doesn’t come, we’ll just sacrificethose close to him one after another.
 That is…?
 It’s a message from the Sand Village!
 Gaara? Why?
 Who knows?The goal is a challenge to Gaara.
 The hostage is a Ninja school student.
 The enemy is escaping in the direction ofthe Land of Fire from the Land of Rivers.
 Gaara, Temari and Kankuro arechasing after them.
 At this point, that’s all we know.
 You want me to set up an operationto stop the overconfident jerks
 who challenged Gaarajust with that information?
 Yeah. We’re on friendly termswith the Sand Village, so.
 Just a minute.
 They came during the Sasuke incidentwith much less information than now.
 Things are more bothersomethan that time!
 Our range would widen significantlyif we ambushed them
 instead of pursuing them.
 There’s also the incident in questionin the Village of Artisans,
 and the Jonin and Chuninare all away…
 – Shizune… 					– Yes, ma’am!
 Those are the only Geninwe can use now.
 Take the Genin you want to use
 and leave the villagewithin thirty minutes!
 Sakura’s name isn’t on here.
 Yeah. She’s doingMedical Ninjutsu training now, so.
 I’ll accept the mission.But I have one condition.
 Please let me borrow Sakura.
 Sakura?
 It’s almost time!ls this everyone, Shikamaru?!
 One person still hasn’t come.
 Could that be…?
 Sorry to keep you waiting!
 I can’t do a mission hungry.So I stopped by Ichiraku for a bit.
 What?! That's not fair just yougetting to eat! I'll also…
 All right! Now we’ve gotall our members together! We’re off!
 Huh? What? This is it?!
 I'd heard this was an operationwith a mobilization
 of the Geninremaining in the village!
 This is everyone, I tell you!
 That’s messed up!
 Setting aside Sakura who’s training,
 there should still beShino, Neji and Hinata!
 No mistake. It’s weird Akamaru and Ibeing the only Ninja
 with search ability.
 So is this teama go-for-it super attack-type?
 Yeah. I name usTeam Return the Favor.
 What lame naming!
 The guys from the Sand Villagehelped us during the Sasuke incident!
 In a manner, this operation will bereturning the favor from that time!
 All right! Guys, let’s make sure toreturn the favor from that time.
 You’re not the leader!
 Shikamaru the Chunin is the leaderof this platoon, right?!
 That’s right…
 Jeez, then let’s settle on a strategyand get going as soon as possible.
 Are we going in one lineas we did for the Sasuke incident?
 There’s no doubting the conditionsare similar to the Sasuke incident.
 However, the strategies for pursuitand ambush are completely different!
 We can’t follow them with Byakuganor by using Akamaru’s nose.
 No mistake about that.
 It’s unconventional, but since these areall the people we’ve got,
 we’ll act in groups of two basisas Two-Man Cells.
 Solo action is prohibitedno matter what the case!
 We owe a debt to the Ninja inthe Sand Village.
 However, although this is to repay a debt,no way will we produce casualties!
 Yeah, I got it.
 – Follow me, Ino. 					– Right!
 Choji, you go with Kiba…
 I’m counting on you, Choji, Akamaru.
 Right…
 Lee, you’re with Naruto…
 Right. Please refrainfrom selfish actions.
 You don’t need to remind me like that.
 Also, the four people Naruto mentionedearlier have left before us.
 Four people, do you meanShino, Neji, Hinata and Sakura?
 Yeah. The four will begoing their separate ways
 and won’t take part in future battles!
 Why not?!
 Isn’t that an incredible wasteof battle strength?!
 In place of that, we get a wider rangeof search action…
 And we’ll have them focus onmedical action in the case of battle starting.
 I have been entrusted with your livesand this is my strategy!
 All right, just wait, Gaara!
 I’ll make sure to return the favor!
 The Key to the rusted heart’s door
 Will always be smiling right near by
 Even if rains of spears were to fall,I will run through it
 Because I want to find the joywithout a shape
 This big dream of mine thatcannot be translated to words,
 I will make it come true,even if it were to deepen my wounds
 We stand here today because ofwhat we believed through,
 That is why I will continue running forward,never looking away
 Even if I’m told thatthere is no bright future
 I’ll change it right away,lighting it with all my feeling
 The wind is probably testing our hearts
 In my heart, I gently grasped my hands
 You are probably searching forthe answer to your tears
 Your dream is always waiting near by,with the answers in its hands
 The Key to the rusted heart’s door
 Will always be smiling right near by
 One of the enemies uses wind, huh?lnteresting. I will be her opponent!
 Then I’ll take on the guy who brandishesthe sword that looks like a kid’s toy.
 We’ll take care of this.You go ahead, Gaara.
 But, will it be okay?
 We don’t need your helpto deal with these chumps.
 You hurry, Gaara. That girl isyour student, isn’t she?
 Next time: "Sand Alliancewith The Leaf Shinobi"

script:
Hey boys, listen up!
 Humans aren’t such a big deal
 Who needs tomorrow anyway,
 so don’t hide your fists
 You’re not old enough
 to sell your dreams away to uncertainty
 Hey boys, you’re the only ones
 who can pull the trigger in your heart
 All the kids said
 We’re living in this senseless, ridiculous,
 awesome world right at this moment,
 All the kids said
 Don’t forget every truth or lie
 All the kids said
 We’re way too young to die
 In this empty town lined with empty faces
 All the kids took off
 into this windless night
 Because they want to change something
 Huh, it’s Lady Tsunade.
 Huh? You guys are…
 Hey, are you visiting someoneat the hospital too?
 Yes.
 You too, Lady Tsunade?
 Well, I guess…
 She just doesn’t want to stayin the executive office…
 Shut up!
 Hinata, don’t faint whenyou see Kurenai Sensei.
 P-Please let's not talk about that.
 Did something happen?
 When we were visiting Narutoin the hospital in the past…
 Shino!
 This girl fainted when she saw Narutoall covered with bandages.
 Kiba!
 I’ll…I’ll be fine this time!
 I finally found you…!
 Old Lady Tsunade, I needto talk to you!
 Huh? Hinata!
 Naruto…
 – Naruto is…so close!– Hinata? Hinata! What's wrong?
 Your face looks a little red…
 Do you have a fever or something? Huh?
 Hey…
 H-Hey, Hinata…?!
 Hey Hinata!
 Are you okay?!Get a hold of yourself!
 Hinata!
 Naruto…
 The Search forthe Rare Bikochu Beetle
 Hey, you woke up.
 So Mizuki didn’t know anything,you said?
 Tsunade interrogated him herself.
 He didn’t have any information
 that would lead to Orochimaru’scurrent whereabouts…
 After all, that guy was nothing buta disposable pawn to Orochimaru, huh.
 So it seems…
 We still don’t know whereSasuke went…
 And that’s the result aftera desperate fight with Mizuki…
 That can’t sit right withNaruto either…huh?
 Please Old Lady Tsunade,say it’s okay!
 When I say no, I mean no!
 As a result, Lady Tsunade wasn’t ableto concentrate on her work.
 Naruto’s been breathing downher neck the whole time
 asking her to let him go offin search of Sasuke.
 So she sneaked outof her office, but…
 He was lying in wait for her here.
 Naruto…
 I’ve asked you numerous times already!
 Please let me go in searchof Sasuke!
 I’ve told you numerous times already.lmpossible!
 Why!
 You have some training to do!
 I can’t because Pervy Sageisn’t around!
 We have zero leads on eitherOrochimaru and Sasuke.
 So how are you planningto search for him?
 I can figure it out somehow!
 If there aren’t any leads,I’ll go find some!
 So please let me go do it!
 You’re stubborn, aren't you?
 You’re stubborn too,Old Lady Tsunade!
 – Please let me go!– No, you may not!
 If I say I’m going, I’m going!
 Shut up! No means no!
 Byakugan!
 All right! Good work, Neji!
 Move in another half stepright there!
 Yes sir!
 Sorry to keep you waiting.
 Let’s take a break, Neji.
 Yes.
 Have some tea too.
 Thank you…
 If Hinata was here,she should have observed a little.
 Hinata prepared this…?
 It would supplement her trainingby observing…
 Byakugan!
 Let’s take a break.
 Yes.
 Food! Food!
 That was pretty well done.
 I would say that you’re getting closerto perfecting the technique.
 It’s thanks to you both.
 You’re so kind to join mein my special training every day…
 We’re a team.
 When a comrade in the teamis in a fix,
 one offers a helping hand.
 That’s only natural…
 A comrade…
 If a comrade suddenly disappears,
 it must be awfully hard.
 You’re talking about Naruto,aren’t you?
 Isn't there some waywe could help him?
 I’d like to help him out insome way too…but…
 Lady Hokage was telling Naruto…
 that there are no leads at all.
 There may be one resource…
 Really?!
 I’m talking about Bikochu.
 Bikochu?
 Are you talking aboutthose rare insects…?!
 I have heard that they hadbecome extinct some time ago.
 Since there was a possibilitythat they could become extinct,
 the Aburame Clan discontinuedusing them,
 so a miniscule number of themshould still be alive.
 Lady Tsunade, what are Bikochu?
 Well…it’s not surprising thatyou don’t know about them.
 The last time that Bikochuwere used
 was before the last Great War…
 Bikochu are one kind of insectused by insect handlers.
 Larvae which have hatched from eggsbecome chrysalises in no time at all,
 then emerge and turninto imagos.
 They are then made torecognize scents…
 and they are able to trackeven the faintest scent…
 to its source.
 Their olfactory sense is several thousandtimes greater than a Ninja Hound's.
 They are insects capable ofexhibiting that skill in an exceptional way.
 However, Bikochu lay eggsonly once every several years…
 This year is actually the yearin which they lay eggs.
 And right now is exactlythe time when they hatch.
 I see.
 There are still some ofSasuke’s belongings left in the village…
 Right?
 If one makes the Bikochu,recognize that scent…
 We may be able to locateSasuke’s whereabouts, right?
 What is the probabilityof finding a Bikochu?
 Frankly speaking, not very high.Perhaps 10%.
 10% huh…
 As you guys know,
 the situation in the villageis currently very grave…
 We don’t have the leeway of allowingeven Genin to sit around and play.
 However, fortunately or unfortunately,Kurenai has been hospitalized,
 so you guys, Squad Eight,no longer have a mission.
 Rather than just lettingyou sit around and play,
 I’d rather place my beton that 10% possibility.
 Huh… you mean…
 Shino Aburame. Kiba Inuzuka.Hinata Hyuga.
 I order you to search forthe Bikochu!
 – All right! 					– All right!
 I designate Shinoas the leader this time.
 And…that spy up there!
 Oww…!
 Naruto…
 You’re going to go even ifI try to stop you, right?
 Yup!
 In that case, I have no choicebut to let you go…
 However…
 This is your last chance.
 If you don’t find the Bikochu…
 you must give up on Sasuke!
 Wha--?
 You understand?!
 It’ll be fine…I’ll find it without fail.
 All right. You won’t go backon your word, right?
 Yeah! Leave it to me!
 You’re easily pleased, aren’t you?
 Owww!
 Naruto…
 Sasuke…
 Hinata.
 Good morning.
 Neji will be here soonfor his training…
 Please prepare tea as always.
 Well…
 Huh? What’s the matter?
 I need to go…on a mission starting now…
 A mission, huh…
 In that case, it can’t be helped…
 I’m heading out…
 Don’t be a burden to the others.
 Yes, sir!
 I’m…I’m sorry! I’m in a hurry…
 The way she handledher physical response just now…
 Hinata…
 You’re late, Hinata!
 I’m sorry!
 All right then! Let’s head out!
 Let’s go!
 Huh?
 Why are you walking atsuch a leisurely pace?!
 It takes a Shinobi two days on foot
 to get to the habitat ofthe Bikochu …
 There’s no need to make hastefrom the very start.
 But what if the eggs hatchbefore we get there?
 The eggs of Bikochu only hatchon the day after it’s rained…
 There’s no sign of itraining any time soon…
 But…if by some remote chance…
 Naruto.
 Wh-What is it?
 I am the leader of this team.
 While we are on this mission,you will obey the orders of your leader.
 Kiba, I can’t believe you’re ableto work with that kind of guy…
 Well, I’ve gotten used to it…
 I’m sure you’ll bond with him too, Naruto.
 I wonder about that…
 Naruto and the othersleft a while ago.
 I see.
 Didn’t you want to go too?
 When it comes to searchingfor insects,
 Shino, who’s an insect handler,is number one…
 And then Hinata who has Byakugan…
 and Kiba and Akamaru who havesensitive noses are there too…
 So there’s really no role thatI could play!
 What I must do right now…
 is to become a Medical Ninjaas soon as I possibly can!
 What’s the matter, Shino?!
 The sun’s going down.We’re setting up camp.
 Got it.
 – Huh? 					– Okay.
 Huh? What…?!
 We’re gonna set upcamp already?!
 I’m not tired at all yet!Let’s go further!
 Naruto, the leader ofthis team is me.
 I-I understand!
 Okay then…let’s sleep.
 Huh…we’re gonna sleep already?!
 Many animals and plantsgo to sleep at sunset
 and awake at sunrise.
 In order to search for insects,
 we must understand the rhythmof living creatures with our own bodies…
 But…the sun’s just set…
 Naruto, I am the leader of this team…
 Okay, okay. I got it!
 There’s no wayI can sleep so early…
 Yeah, right…
 All that complaining and guesswho's the first one to fall asleep?
 I have to pee…
 Huh?
 Huh?
 What’s that?
 It’s a waterfall…
 Hey… Is somebody there?
 S-Say…
 Damn it…!
 S-Sorry. Did I scare you?
 Huh?
 There’s nobody there…
 Huh, Naruto…Did you catch a cold?
 Yeah…a little…
 After sleeping so muchyou’re still tired?
 Well, uh…
 When I woke up last night to pee,I saw something awesome…
 Did you catch a cold too, Hinata?
 No, I’m okay…
 And…what was that awesome thing?
 It was a beautiful womanin the middle of the waterfall!
 Huh?
 When that person moved her arms,the water would suddenly move too!
 It was awesome!
 And what happened then…
 When I tried to speak to her,she suddenly vanished.
 You must have been dreamingor something.
 It's starting to feel that way…
 You idiot!
 Your face is red, Hinata.
 You might have reallycaught a cold.
 Huh…really, I’m fine…
 This fruit is edible.This will be our meal today.
 Got it.
 We can save onour food supplies too.
 There’s one thingI need to warn you about.
 On rare occasions, this fruit growsto the size of a human being.
 However, those fruitsare damaged inside.
 Don’t tamper with themunder any circumstance.
 There’s nobody who wouldeat something that huge.
 N-Naruto…!
 He’s eating it…
 Naruto… We’re going on ahead…
 I’ll…I’ll be right behind you!
 Sorry to keep you waiting!
 Wait just a second!
 Hey…aren’t we there yet?
 Yes.
 We're here!
 What…?
 Wow!
 I’ve never seen anythinglike this before.
 This certainly isn’t a placewhere humans could inhabit.
 That’s right…That’s why it’s paradise for insects.
 D-Don’t tell me…
 Could it be that…over there…?
 You mean that’s wherethe Bikochu are?
 No problem.lt’s better than the Chunin Exam.
 Damn…The foothold crumbles easily…
 – Naruto… 					– What?
 As the leader, I’m warning you…
 At a time like this,what is it?!
 Don’t fall.
 I already know thatwithout your telling me!
 Naruto!
 No way…!
 That was close…
 Those were insects, huh…
 That’s why I warned you.
 When this mission is over,
 I’m definitely gonna kickthat guy’s butt!
 This is…the Bikochu forest.
 Let’s go.
 There’s no mistake.Those are Leaf Shinobi.
 The fact that those guys came toa place like this
 means their objective is…
 Yeah…it’s the same as ours…the Bikochu.
 We’re not gonna let themtake any Bikochu.
 The Bikochu, …belong to us, the Kamizuru Clan!
 Crappy news pass us by
 And you become speechless
 My voice is way too soft
 So you don’t answer
 You’re crying   Crying alone
 What can I do?   I’m crying too
 “Let my lonely scream ring outthrough the night”
 I’ll thrash this confused erawith my speed   Yeah
 And I’ll thrash this confused nightwith my speed   Yeah
 I’ll thrash them with my piercing guitarand my speed   Yeah
 This sinking world and its evil bastards,I’ll kick their butt   Yeah
 Huh! If you’re talking aboutthe insect in this photograph,
 I’m very familiar with it.
 – Huh? 					– Really?!
 Damn…Don’t tell methat was a Bikochu?
 Where did you see it?
 I heard some rustling in the kitchenin the middle of the night,
 and I unintentionally threwa slipper at it…
 Wait a second…
 N-Naruto…
 What you’re talking aboutis an ordinary cockroach.
 Next episode: “What’s the Difference?Don’t All Insects Look Alike?”

script:
Hey boys, listen up!
 Humans aren’t such a big deal
 Who needs tomorrow anyway,
 so don’t hide your fists
 You’re not old enough
 to sell your dreams away to uncertainty
 Hey boys, you’re the only ones
 who can pull the trigger in your heart
 All the kids said
 We’re living in this senseless, ridiculous,
 awesome world right at this moment,
 All the kids said
 Don’t forget every truth or lie
 All the kids said
 We’re way too young to die
 In this empty town lined with empty faces
 All the kids took off
 into this windless night
 Because they want to change something
 Funeral March for the Living
 Wh-Why…
 Why does sucha good man have to…die?!
 It’s sad… 					lt’s so sad!
 I remember now…
 I forgot when,but you showed it to me, didn’t you?
 With a twinkle in your eye,
 you proudly said it wasa memento of your father.
 That was the pipe box, wasn’t it?lt was an amazing box.
 No wonder you’re so proud of it…
 Even though I took it and smashed it,you only laughed.
 You were smiling whenwe kicked you and tossed you.
 It was a great smile.
 Really…
 Hold it in, Rokusuke!They’ll all be gone.
 If we let this moment go,
 there will be no other chanceto get out of the village.
 But Kanpachi is…!
 It’s for the village,
 we have to do something andmake our way to that village!
 Yeah…
 Funerals are awesome, aren’t they!
 I wanna do that again.
 One…two…three people…got away again…
 Looks like we can haveanother funeral.
 This is…
 The Village Hidden in the Leaves.
 You are…?
 Naruto Uzumaki! Right now,I’m in the middle of training.
 The Village Hidden in the Leaves…
 H-Hey! I said hey!
 Hang in there!
 This is training too…!
 I can’t give up yet! Not yet!
 The escort for the ruler ofthe Land of Swamps, Lord Chichiyasu,
 was completed without incident!
 Well done.
 That’s Lady Tsunade’s…!
 Excellent dumplings are alwaysfrom the Leaf Village, aren’t they?
 That was my last one!
 Mission Accomplished!
 I came to pound the piratesof the Gottani Channel
 with the fist of love!
 If they take this opportunityto rehabilitate themselves,
 it’s worth while to shed a tear!
 I’ll have your team do it for me.
 Yes?
 Even though we’re already busy,that Naruto brought in more work.
 After this, Guy has the S-rank mission.
 The client picked him,so he must depart today.
 So, do it without Guy.
 That’s pretty straightforward…
 I called Neji Hyuga,Tenten and Lee.
 Ohh!
 My pupils can undertake the fulfillmentof this mission without incident!
 Wait…
 Take Naruto Uzumaki, too.
 Why can't it just be my pupils,who are loved by all the world?
 Please answer me, Lady Tsunade!
 It just is.
 Hidden Leaf Hospital
 Those three people that Naruto savedcame all the way
 from the Katabami Gold Mineto request a mission.
 Katabami Gold Mine is one ofthe Land of Rivers’ greatest mines,
 but about half a year ago, hooliganscalling themselves the Kurosuki family
 appeared on the pretext of guarding it,and took control of the village…
 killing villagers forno particular reason.
 How vile!
 Your mission is this:
 Once those three haveregained their strength,
 escort them to Katabami Gold Mineand eliminate the Kurosuki family.
 It’s a simple mission.
 Well anyway, it must be a groupof punks who’re after money.
 Why did you call me forsuch an easy mission?
 Who do you think you are?
 I’m busy searching forSasuke and training, and--!
 You forced your way into missionsthat you weren’t called for.
 It’s not a Genin’s placeto choose his missions!
 Would you like to be sent backto the Academy? Well?!
 Neji Hyuga!
 Yes!
 You’re the leader!
 It will be good training for youto try to tame the unstable.
 I don’t want to…but, I’ll do it!
 I’ll go continue my training!
 Hey Naruto!
 Please excuse them.They have no manners…
 Wait!
 Those little brats…!
 What the heck dothey think missions are?!
 Umm, excuse me?
 What?!
 The Kurosuki Family…
 What did you saytheir boss’ name was?
 Raiga!
 That’s what I thought…
 What?
 Well, on a previous mission,I heard a rumor about him.
 A rumor…?
 Pervy Sage hasn’t returned…I’m forced to go on a mission…
 Oh, this is irritating…
 Sakura!
 Naruto?
 What’s going on? A bird?
 Yesterday I found it injuredand treated it, but…
 Sakura, that’s amazing!
 But poor thing.
 It’s separated from its friends.
 Naruto!
 Oh, sorry, did I intrude?
 You intruded big time!
 No, no!
 Don’t turn your back,no need to grovel to youth.
 Sakura, Hello!
 Hello!
 What did you come here for?
 – Just to have a word.– Huh? What the--?!
 Oh, Sakura, goodbye!
 – Hey! What was that?!– She went wild, didn't she?
 She should act her age.
 Ichiraku		What?! The boss of		the Kurosuki family
 is one of the Seven Ninja SwordsMen of the Mist?
 Yeah, it’s exclusive informationfrom our respected teacher, Guy.
 Who’re the Seven Ninja SwordsMen of the Mist?
 Naruto, you said that
 you fought in the Land ofthe Waves mission, didn’t you?
 At that time…
 Oh, Zabuza! And?
 And Guy Sensei and Kakashi Senseifought Kisame Hoshigaki.
 I heard thatyou met them there too, Naruto.
 Oh! I know that guy!
 Those two were once called
 the Seven Ninja SwordsMen of the Mist.
 And at that time,who was with Kisame Hoshigaki?
 Oh!
 The man called Itachi!And then?
 You still don’t understand?
 If Raiga is one of the Seven Ninja SwordsMen of the Mist,
 then he’s probably tied to Itachiwho was with Kisame.
 Oh! And?
 Tell me, who's after Itachi?
 I know! Sasuke!
 That’s right!
 We can probably getthe clue to Sasuke’s whereabouts
 at Katabami Gold Mine!
 But…
 If that’s what Guy Sensei said then…
 Don’t say anything rude!
 It's information that's100% reliable!
 Starting now,while guarding Rokusuke and the others,
 we head toward Katabami Gold Mine
 to fulfill our mission towipe out the Kurosuki family.
 There’s a shop I’m familiarwith close to the gold mine.
 Let’s make that the base.
 What do you meana shop you’re familiar with?
 That’s the fun part of the trip.
 That aside, that Naruto is late…
 If the source of the informationis Guy Sensei,
 maybe he couldn’t quite trust it?
 That’s not true!Naruto will definitely come!
 That’s because Guy Sensei’sinformation is correct!
 Whatever.
 Here I am!
 We’re all here so…!
 Is that for you to say?!
 Let’s go!
 So…which way?
 Don’t be so anxious, Rokusuke,
 Those guys will save our town.
 It’s post-meal training!
 I won’t lose!
 I won’t lose!
 How long do you intendto rest here?!
 If we hurry, we can save Kanpachifrom the burial…
 Give it up…
 How long do you thinkit’s been since that happened?
 It’s painful but…
 I remember…this sleepiness.The shop is close by.
 You say you’re sleepy,and are you walking in your sleep?!
 It’s okay.
 I slept while on a marathon onthis road for three days straight.
 You are joking, right?
 It’s true.
 The track meet of my youthwith Guy Sensei.
 My body still remembers it.
 I’ve gotten sleepy.
 Hey, Bushy Brow,are you really okay?
 That’s right. In this area,there’s the scent of spicy curry.
 Curry? Now that you mention it…
 That’s right!
 Over there, it’s…the Curry of Life Shop!
 Grandma Sansho!
 Oh my… 					Oh goodness!
 I haven’t seen you for a while!
 – Oh my my my!– You're looking well!
 This is the shop Lee is familiar with?
 That mountain isthe Katabami Gold Mine
 Grandma Sansho’s curry saved my life.
 So you’re sayingit’s delicious curry?
 No, it really saved my life.I’m indebted to this curry.
 It was whenI’d just become a Genin …
 When Guy Sensei gave mea special training routine.
 Oh my, that’s right.I remember.
 Do your best!
 Oh my…
 Hey Grandma Sansho!
 Oh my, they’ve come again!
 Those people are running in their sleep.
 Karashi! Karashi!
 If you had that kind of energy,you wouldn’t lose to the bullies.
 Oh my,I might have said too much.
 Curry of Life Shop
 Oh my! It’s the third day.
 They’ve been running the whole time.
 Oh my. What a problem.
 I wonder if he’s hungry…?
 What a pickle! He's not waking up!
 Maybe I didn't useenough spice?
 Karashi…
 I’ve never seen a personwho works this hard.
 Oh really… so you want to helpthis young man too…?
 This is the curry of life.
 Now! Grandma Sansho went tothe trouble of making this curry.
 Let’s eat!
 I’m digging in!
 Yum!This is yummy-yum delicious!
 Delicious! The use of spicesis wonderful!
 And this ricegoes perfectly with the curry!
 Delicious!
 By the way, I don’t see Karashi.
 Karashi saw how hard you worked
 and became a bright kidfull of energy, but…
 He got too much energyand left for town.
 What?
 I was wrong to keep telling himto be stronger.
 “I’m going to be a man!
 “I’m going to be part ofthe Kurosuki family,” he said.
 Oh my! I’m not blaming you.Don’t worry.
 It's too late.
 I’m responsible…
 Oh my.
 Neji!
 Please include Karashi’s rescueinto our mission!
 We’ll bring him back fromthe road of evil!
 It’s fine.
 We’ll use this shop as a baseand take a good look into the village.
 Then we’ll come up with a strategyand spring into action.
 Yes!
 You guys await orders here.
 Because it’s dangerousif the Kurosuki family finds us.
 It’s a disaster!
 Rokusuke! Rokusuke!He's gone!
 I’m sure he went to town alone!
 That’s not good!
 If those guys find Rokusuke…!
 Now that it’s come to this,
 we don’t have timeto come up with a strategy!
 Let’s get right to it!
 No!
 We’ll get right to it!
 Let's hurry.
 Wait for me, Kanpachi,I’m coming now…
 Someone… is coming…
 Aw, again…I have to put on a funeral!
 Crappy news pass us by
 And you become speechless
 My voice is way too soft
 So you don’t answer
 You’re crying   Crying alone
 What can I do?   I’m crying too
 “Let my lonely scream ring outthrough the night”
 I’ll thrash this confused erawith my speed   Yeah
 And I’ll thrash this confused nightwith my speed   Yeah
 I’ll thrash them with my piercing guitarand my speed   Yeah
 This sinking world and its evil bastards,I’ll kick their butt   Yeah
 You taught me that day.
 If you cook with great care,
 you can save someone’s lifewith just one serving of curry.
 Even for a person like me,
 with intense effort,it’s not an impossibility…
 That’s what I thought.
 You were far more admirableback then, Karashi.
 But…
 Next time: “A Lesson Learned!The Iron Fist of Love!”

script:
Connecting old wordsthat have been used up
 I just want to conveymy simple thoughts
 That day's faint wind blows away
 at the castle ruins of yesterday
 I'll laugh with youand live for the moment
 Still that incidentwill continue to trouble you, right?
 That's why it must be good-bye
 Leaving nothing behind,let us share what is left
 In time, we'll realizethat it was everything
 And sadness will touch our cheeks,creating a river of tears
 Trembling thoughts swept into a vortexand melting away
 Heh! It’s over…
 Losing is not an Option
 What?!
 Just barely…
 That was a close one.
 But…I was able to throw it offjust a little.
 There’s no mistake.
 He’s now realized the secretof the Byakugan.
 What’s the meaning of this?How?!
 How was he able to throw it
 a whole six inchesfrom his vital point?!
 I see… That Chakra!
 He was emitting Chakrathe whole time
 and covered the area surrounding him!
 And in a wide range to that extent.
 No wonder he was ableto detect the arrow and
 throw off the trajectory of it.
 But constantly emitting thatmuch Chakra is a death throe…
 If he doesn’t go that far,he can’t dodge.
 In other words, there’s no mistake.
 It’s as I hypothesized…
 The arrow earlier wastotally invisible to him!
 He doesn’t carry out useless attacks…
 And from the results,he accurately examines the information.
 And…he’s also discoveredthe weakness of my eyes…
 Impressive.
 Of all the enemiesI’ve fought until now,
 this guy’s the strongest!
 He has 360-degree sight.
 And he unfailingly detects attacks
 that penetrate the roughly150-feeot circumference around him.
 But for some reason,
 there were Kunai Kniveshe couldn’t evade completely.
 Why couldn’t he evade them?
 Because he couldn’t see them!
 In other words, even his Visual Jutsuhas a slight blind spot!
 Being unable to see Kunai Knivesentering that blind spot,
 he’s unable to react.
 So he was dealing with attacksfrom the blind spot
 with that defense technique.
 And I analyzed all the attacksI carried out
 and grasped them perfectly.
 Right behind his first thoracic vertebra…
 there exists a blind spot expandingfrom a very small point.
 Indeed, if he moves anddoesn’t stabilize the blind spot,
 it becomes difficult to aim therewith an arrow.
 But such a trick…doesn’t fool me!
 Gentle Fist is pointless ifyou don’t come close to your enemy.
 And you can’t afford to think aboutapproaching me at this point.
 It’s about how to escape now…
 Though whether you struggle or not,you’re going to die anyway.
 Heh… It seems you onlyhave a little Chakra left.
 The fate of the small fry characterin an easy game
 is to be destroyed right away!
 It’s useless!
 A thread?!
 I see, with this thread…
 This time, the trajectory was thrown offslightly by the trees, huh?
 If that’s the case…
 I’ll add some rotation this time.
 So even if it hits a tree,
 it’ll just cut through and the trajectorywon’t be thrown off.
 And as before…
 I’ll control the arrow up until150 feet away from him
 using a thread with Chakraflowing through.
 I’ll take aim at the moving target…
 and plunge the arrow intothe blind spot with a pinpoint attack!
 He’s still standing up?
 He’s strong…He’s much stronger than me.
 I hardly have any Chakra left now.
 I probably won’t be able to evadehis next attack completely.
 Is this it?
 I’ll win no matter what!
 Naruto… I wonder what you’d do.
 I’ve had enough.
 I can’t dodge it anyway.
 He’s stopped moving…Has he given up?
 But just to make doubly sure…
 Maximum destructive powerwith 120% accuracy.
 I’ve got him!
 This is it.
 Gentle Fist!
 Wh-What? He still…?!
 No! My attack just nowshould’ve made the kill.
 Substance with Chakra base…
 It’s meaningless against Gentle Fist.
 Gentle Fist…
 I see, in his final moments,
 he funneled the last Chakrathrough the thread!
 Eight crows…
 Again I couldn’t see one of them.
 What happened to him?
 He damaged several ofmy internal organs.
 But…I can still move.
 You failure…
 I told you… I don’t know when to quit!
 Why do you try to go againstyour destiny that much?
 Because I was called…a failure!
 But if you’re going to say it’s futile,you don’t have to do anything!
 After I become the Hokage,I’ll change Hyuga!
 The Ninjutsu that you’re good at, huh?
 I was careless…
 Clone Jutsu was the NinjutsuI stunk at.
 Don’t be whining about boring stufflike destiny and what not,
 and how it can’t be changed!
 Unlike me,
 you're not a failure.
 Naruto…
 Now it’s become the three of us…
 Don’t worry about such things.
 Both Choji and Neji willcatch up right away.
 Choji had the trump card.
 And I’ve fought Nejiin the Chunin exam, so I know…
 Know what?
 That he’s…a true genius. Believe it!
 I cannot lose…
 Whether he’s an enemymuch stronger than me…
 or even if this body should fail me…
 I cannot lose!
 I have a reason why I cannot lose!
 I’ve had a hard time of it this time.
 I played too long…
 Huh?
 I can’t build up Chakra…
 How? You should’vebeen instantly killed!
 How come you’re alive?!
 I couldn’t completelyevade it anyway.
 So I was prepared to deliberatelytake the hit.
 And I knew of my own weaknessmuch more than you do…
 There were eight crows, huh?
 This Byakugan has a blind spot.
 However, if I knew that your attackwould only come from there…
 I could release my Chakra justto that blind spot and detect the attack.
 It’s not so difficult to make
 a move of just a few inchesto throw off the aim.
 I’d suffer a serious injury,but instant death can be avoided.
 So you took the hit deliberately…?
 It doesn’t change the factthat you’re going to die here.
 How can you go that far?!
 “Of all the enemies,”you’re the strongest I’ve ever fought…
 But, there’s a reason why I cannot lose.
 Of all those I’ve ever fought,the strongest one said this to me…
 – Unlike me…you are not a failure!– Unlike me…you are not a failure!
 He said that.
 I’ve been called a genius all along.
 So I cannot lose.
 And for the sake of those guyswho believe
 that this humdrum and small meis a genius!
 “The fate of the small fry characterin a game is to be destroyed right away.”
 You said that, didn’t you?
 Look at this situation!
 Things like fate,isn’t determined by someone!
 I wonder…
 You also look likeyou’re going to die!
 Neji, live.
 More than anyone in the clan,
 you’re the man loved mostby the Hyuga ability…
 I cannot die so easily.
 Even if you act tough,you can’t stem the current now…
 Master Sasuke ran tothe Sound Village by his own wish.
 Sasuke is now in the darkness…
 No…
 Naruto… You’ve got better eyes than me.
 There’s a person who can find himin the darkness and save him.
 Master Sasuke belongsto Lord Orochimaru.
 No matter who it may be,they can’t save…
 He can save him!
 Because…Naruto…you…
 You saved me from the darkness!
 Talking rubbish until the end…
 But…
 I haven’t been pushed this farsince Kimimaro.
 Damn it…
 Everyone…
 I'll leave the rest…
 to you.
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 And you smiled
 For the first time, I was able to speak
 In my own words
 Would you think it wasa bother if I approached you?
 Despite my doubts,I worked up my courage
 My clumsy attempts with words
 You listened without turning away
 No wonder I get carried away by you
 But you don’t feel anything for me, do you?
 I feel so sad
 But…
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 And you smiled
 For the first time, I was able to speak
 In my own words
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 And you smiled
 For the first time, I was able to speak
 In my own words
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 Yahoo! The enemies are quite close!
 All right! We’ll catch up in a burst!
 Speaking in terms of number,we’ve got more!
 If things go well,we can get him back next!
 Yeah! I don’t feel like losingwith four against two!
 Four against two?
 That’s twice the opponents’ number!
 Say-say. Were there four of us?
 Are you an idiot?!Me, Akamaru, Shikamaru, and you!
 No matter how you count,there are four!
 Next episode:“The Vessel Arrives Too Late”

script:
Connecting old wordsthat have been used up
 I just want to conveymy simple thoughts
 That day's faint wind blows away
 at the castle ruins of yesterday
 I'll laugh with youand live for the moment
 Still that incidentwill continue to trouble you, right?
 That's why it must be good-bye
 Leaving nothing behind,let us share what is left
 In time, we'll realizethat it was everything
 And sadness will touch our cheeks,creating a river of tears
 Trembling thoughts swept into a vortexand melting away
 It’s close.
 That’s strange.
 There hasn’t been evenone trap set for a while…
 Shikamaru, what do you think?
 We’re being underestimated.
 Those guys think the only onefollowing them is that big guy.
 They don’t need to seta trap on their man.
 How dare they underestimate us!
 It seems you’re right.
 We are beingcompletely  underestimated.
 However, this is our chance.
 Yeah… We’ll take them by surprise.
 Your Opponent is Me!
 That Jirobo is late.
 No, he’s already here.
 Aw, c’mon, what took you so long?
 Sorry.
 It took time to eat the scums’ Chakra.
 Hey fatso, don’t you dare drag!
 Hurry up and carry that coffin…
 That’s your job, you vulgar swine.
 I know.
 What, Jirobo…You’re awfully easygoing today.
 What do you mean?
 I’m just saying I’m not handing youthe coffin.
 Because you’re not Jirobo!
 This time let me do it.
 Sakon, Tayuya, you guys go ahead!
 Jirobo always correctsTayuya’s choice of words.
 Heh, I see.
 Ninja Art: Spider Web Net.
 You!
 Ninja Art: Spiral Spider Web
 Naruto!
 Now Kiba, Akamaru!
 He shouldn’t be able tomove in mid-air.
 Fang Over Fang!
 I won’t let you get away!
 That’s my line.
 Look at your feet.
 You!
 It’s too soon for you to thinkyou captured us with a thing like this!
 Shut up!
 C’mon, what the hell isthat fatso doing, dammit!
 It was a mistake to leavebehind the weakest of us, after all.
 Got it.
 – Neji! 					– What?!
 Me, Naruto, Kiba and Neji…
 Even though we’ve followed the plan,it’s no good.
 I’m going to cocoon you.
 Damn!
 Damn it! Damn it!
 What’s with this thread?! It won’t cut.
 It’s useless.
 My thread is so strong thateven if two elephants pulled away,
 it wouldn’t break.
 Shadow Clone… Interesting.
 The thread is sticking…
 This stickiness is probably made
 by mixing Chakra withhis special body fluid.
 Moreover, this strength. Even afterit’s been released from his hands…
 Chakra’s continuously flowingin the thread.
 It’s impossible…The level of the Jutsu is unrealistic.
 Calm down… Just calm down…
 my Chakra.
 Ninja Art:Gum Style Spider Thread.
 It’s a different color thanthe thread from before.
 What’s he gonna do?
 It’s quickly solidifying, huh…
 You are the first one,so it’s like a little entertainment.
 Now I’ll play a game to seewhich of you is the real one.
 What did you say?!
 First is…you at the end.
 Naruto!
 It was a clone, huh.Well, this one next!
 What a lucky guy.
 Next, I’ll do two at a time.The odds are 2 to 1.
 This guy has a great luck,but it's either one or the other now!
 Turns out he made it to the last.
 Well, it was fun as a game,but now the game’s over.
 Die!
 The first one is done.
 What?!
 I see, the real body madeits shadow clones get caught,
 and hid himself andwaited for a chance, huh.
 For a small fish like that to makesuch a plan in those circumstances...
 You're not too bad…but …
 You’re at the end of the line. Die!
 What?!
 Naruto, your stall was helpful.
 Neji!
 You… How…?!
 Substance with Chakra base…
 It’s meaningless in frontof Gentle Fist
 that destroys by pouringChakra through.
 That guy’s Jutsu…
 Evidently I’m the only onewho can fight it.
 Go!
 I’ll take care of this.
 What’s wrong? Hey, Akamaru.
 Apparently, this guy’s strongerthan the fatso before.
 Quite a bit stronger.
 If we’re not prepared for“one person, one kill,”
 then it’s not going to work out.
 That’s what you said earlier.
 Yeah, that’s right.
 Plus, we won’t be able to catch upwith Sasuke if we stall here.
 Choji hasn’t come back either.
 The reason we’re doing this
 is because of the missionto bring back Sasuke.
 But that’s not all.
 What we are after and tryingto protect is the bond
 of the Shinobi ofthe Village Hidden in the Leaves.
 Do you remember Iruka’s wordsat the Third Hokage’s funeral?
 Iruka Sensei, why do people risktheir lives for others?
 When someone dies,
 they depart with their past,present and future.
 Many people die on missionsor at war.
 And their death is surprisinglyunceremonious…they simply die.
 Hayate was one of those people.
 Those who die have dreamsand goals, too…
 But everyone has things thatare equally important.
 Parents, siblings, friends, lovers,the people of their village,
 the people important to you.
 The connection to the peopleyou trust and help mutually,
 the people important to youfrom the day you were born.
 And the thread thatconnects you and your people
 gets stronger through time.
 It’s not a theory.
 That’s what a person doesas the thread is established
 because they’re important to you…
 Look, Sasuke is headingtowards Orochimaru.
 We can’t let Orochimaru geta hold of someone from our village.
 Absolutely not.
 And…
 Naruto…
 Your eyes are better than mine.
 Right now, Sasuke is…
 in the darkness.
 Hurry up and go!I’ll catch up with you all!
 Gotcha!
 Okay! Let’s go!
 You along with Choji,be sure to catch up!
 Yeah…
 Neji, be absolutely sure to catch up!
 Heh…think I’ll let them get away?!
 Byakugan!
 Here it comes!
 This guy’s pretty good…
 Neji!
 That’s Neji all right!
 Not yet…I won’t let you escape that easily!
 I won’t let you go any further from here!
 It’s useless.
 Well, that’s fine.
 It seems you’re the strongestout of the lot.
 Aw man, now I wanna play…
 It’s such a waste ifa game isn't played little by little.
 For starters,I’ll play and kill you in three minutes.
 I got you.
 You’re pretty good at handling Chakraand you’ve got sharp eyes.
 You release Chakra fromthe Chakra points in your hands
 like a sharp needle.
 You see the thin part of the threadwith Chakra running through it, and attack.
 I see, I’ve heard from Lord Orochimaru…
 This is what’s called Gentle Fist, isn’t it?
 But if you can’t usethose annoying hands,
 they can’t cut my threads either.
 Man, games. The instant you knowthe rules of engagement,
 they’re no longer interesting.
 It’s only been a minute,but I’m already tired of you.
 Die!
 Ninja Art:Gum Style Spider Thread
 What?!
 How did he…?!
 I’ll explain, specially to you.
 It’s not just my hands
 I can release Chakra fromall of the Chakra points on my body.
 And it’s game over.
 Gentle Fist: 8 trigrams 64 palms.
 Once in a long while, once in a while
 The remnants of a personbroken by dreams
 Look like a mountain
 Clinging to the Divine,clinging to Buddha
 The remnants of a person crying
 Look like a mountain
 Rendezvous with a happy dance circle
 This is my victory pose, round and around (round around)
 Shake shake shakeLet’s look
 With a bye-bye rhythm that never ends
 Look like a mountain
 Look like a mountain
 Look like a mountain
 Look like a mountain
 The attack on his Chakra pointsis ineffective.
 On top of that,
 he switched to a long-distance attackto avoid Gentle Fist.
 This guy blocks my every moveand he quickly reads my hands.
 This is bad. I’m at a disadvantageif the fight drags on.
 And if he noticed that, then…
 Next time: “360 Degrees of Vision:The Byakugan’s Blind Spot!”

script:
Yeah, turn your sadness into kindness,your uniqueness into strength
 Even if you get lost, let’s start walking
 One more time
 Are you really happy
 when you're always meetingto someone's expectations?
 Even if you change towho you really wanna be
 Will you always have a great smile?
 Dreaming of only “the beginning,”I wake up
 and someday, I'll live on my own.
 Yes, precious things are never in shape
 You never know what it iswhen you get it or lose it
 Yeah, turn your sadness into kindness,your uniqueness into strength
 Even if you get lost,let's start walking
 One more time
 Dang it!
 Darn it! Things will really be badif it stays like this…!
 I’ll have to…
 I’ll have to save…everyone for sure!
 Light vs. Dark:The Two Faces of Gaara!
 So you’ll fight for the sake of others?!
 That’s why you guys areonly at that level!
 You don’t need a reason to fight!
 Only the one who remains undefeatedcan actually feel his own existence!
 Come on, forget aboutyour insignificant friends
 and fight only for the sakeof your own existence!
 Insignificant…
 friends?
 Those who hold silly sentimentsabout fighting
 should just die!
 I'm sick of listening to you talk!
 I'll clobber you for sure!
 You guys misunderstand real strength!
 Shut up!
 W-Why…? Why is it?!
 Why Yashamaru…?
 Why did you, why…?
 Why…?
 Love is…
 a heart that desires to servea precious person who is close to oneself,
 to love and watch over that person.
 Just like my older sister did.
 You are a precious personwho is close to me, Gaara!
 Always…only Yashamaru would always…
 Me…always me…
 It was an order.
 I was commissioned to kill you…
 By your father…
 Lord Kazekage.
 My father…?
 Why did my father…?
 Why…? Why me?
 Gaara, you who were born and possessedby the Sand Spirit Shukaku…
 have been watched overas an experiment.
 However, Gaara, you couldn’tcontrol the living spirit Shukaku,
 the Sand Spirit which possessesthe power of the sand.
 Eventually your existence wouldbecome too dangerous for the village.
 Before that occurred…
 So Yashamaru, you had not choice…
 but to comply with my father’s order…?
 No… That is not correct.
 It is true I acceptedLord Kazekage’s order.
 But if I had wanted to turn it down,I could have turned it down.
 Gaara…
 Deep down in my heart,I probably…
 hated you.
 You, whose birth took the lifeof my beloved older sister.
 The child she left behind in death…
 Thinking that you were her remembrance,I tried desperately to love you.
 However… I was not able to.
 My sister didn’t choose to have you.
 My sister became a sacrificefor the village,
 and she died whilecursing this village!
 From that time, I probably…
 have been burdened with a woundof the heart that could never heal.
 Unlike a wound on the body,there is no ointment and sometimes,
 it doesn’t heal for one’s entire life.
 A wound of the heart?
 Your name…is the name my sister gave you.
 "This child’s name is Gaara…
 "A devil that loves only itself…
 "Love only yourself…
 "And fight only foryour own sake.
 "If you do that,you will continue to exist."
 Such was the hope it contained.
 However…
 my sister did not give you this name
 because she was concernedabout you or loved you.
 The reason she gave you this name,a name so you would continue to exist…
 …was so that the deep-seated hatredof my sister
 who died hating and cursingthis village…
 would remain…
 and be known to all!
 You were never…loved!
 This is the last…
 Please die…
 I believe that my sister loved you, Gaara.
 Love?
 The sand automatically trying toprotect you is like the love of a mother.
 I believe that sand is filledwith your mother’s will.
 Love.
 Love only yourself.
 And fight only for your own sake.
 So that is Gaara…That is me.
 I finally understand.
 I am alone.
 I will no longer believe in anyone…or love anyone.
 I am alone!
 Yes, I am all by myself.
 What’s the matter?Hurry up and come at me!
 Don't you care what happensto your so-called precious friends?!
 Sakura!
 Dang it!
 Naruto’s not his usual self…
 Did something happen between them?
 In any case…
 In any case,I need to save Sakura!
 But… what to do?!
 That’s it!
 Since it's come to this…Though it's gonna use up a lot of Chakra…
 There’s no choicebut to summon the Chief Gamabunta!
 Summoning Jutsu!
 What’s this?! You’re a little kid!
 If you want something from me,give me some snack!
 If you don’t, I won’t play with you!
 You know something?I hate you frogs!
 What did you say?!Don’t make fun of amphibians! Really!
 Jeez, I don’t have time toplay with you, little squirt!
 Darn! Why is it…?
 I practiced for so long, but with this,there’s no other way…
 I need to save everyone!
 Everyone…you say?
 Don’t make me laugh.
 I fight…only for myself!
 He…he’s transforming again!
 If you don’t take me down,the sand over this girl won’t fall away!
 Not only that, as time passes…
 this sand will slowly squeeze tighterand eventually suffocate this girl!
 Sakura!
 He’s getting closer and closerto being a Perfect Possession.
 That Jutsu hasn’t been activated yet,
 but at this rate, I’ll also be…!
 Those eyes…
 Sand Shuriken!
 You’re…really weak!
 Shut up!
 But what is that guy?
 You’re persistent…Sarutobi Sensei!
 I-It doesn’t move?!
 Y-You hard-to-kill fools!
 Do you still not understand, Orochimaru?
 The Leaf Village is my home!
 I told you I am the pillarof that house!
 That’s why I’m sayingI will break that pillar!
 As long as the people of the village
 fiercely fight to protecttheir dear comrades,
 the pillar of the Leaf Village will notbe broken by the likes of you!
 I wonder about that.
 Do not underestimate the Hokage!
 I-Impossible…!
 Where is…?Most of your Chakra should be gone!
 Chakra and Ninjutsu arenot all there is to strength!
 W-What lonely eyes…
 Such lonely eyes…
 This guy is also turning into a monster…the same as me.
 I hated every last one of them.
 I didn’t understand who I was,
 why I was so hated,why I even existed.
 In other words,
 you’re the Nine-Tailed Fox who killedlruka’s parents and ruined the village!
 You’ve been deceived by everyonein the village all along!
 I…
 When I learned that theNine-Tailed Fox was inside me,
 everyone in the village seemedeven more cold-hearted…
 I was so deeply troubled…
 But…
 Naruto! Let’s go haveramen for a change!
 Yay! I will, I will!
 I’ll have the one withextra BBQ pork slices!
 Huh! You loser…lf you want to beat me train harder!
 Shut up! I won’t lose to you!
 Hey Naruto!What did Sasuke say about me?
 He didn’t say anything…
 By the way! By the way!Wouldn't you rather know how I feel…?
 Oh! Really, Sakura!
 I’m gonna eat now!
 Um… Naruto, you’ll really die if you eatonly noodles and sweet red bean porridge.
 You’re a Ninja,so eat more vegetables!
 Here, have some!
 What?! I don’t like vegetables!
 People appeared who acknowledged me…
 That’s why I became all right,
 even though there wasthe demon fox inside my body,
 or even if the people of the villagelooked at me with cold eyes.
 Because…I wasn’t alone anymore!
 I never imagined how happy andfortunate I could feel.
 How really…really…
 great it was.
 How truly great it wasto be here.
 I was relieved to knowI am allowed to be here, to exist!
 That’s why it scares meto think about the past…
 That suffering is agonizing…
 It’s a pitch-black hell!
 If…I had remained that way, all alone…
 That’s precisely why I understand!
 So what did I have in this life,why did I keep living?
 This is the answer I came to…
 I am living in order to killhuman beings other than myself.
 I don’t know what happened, but…
 This guy’s always beensuffering all alone…
 Even now, without ever feeling relief…
 Only able to believe in himself…
 Even now, he’s battling in hell…
 That’s how it is…
 To him, someone like mewho's acknowledged by others…
 might seem like a weakling ina world of happiness without tension…
 Can I really win againsta guy like this?
 What’s the matter?!Are you afraid of me?
 To fight for the sake of oneself?To fight for the sake of others?
 You should just love yourself,and fight for yourself!
 That is the definition ofthe strongest one!
 Now fight me!
 What happened tothe boldness you had earlier?!
 Show me your strength!I’ll throw that strength to the ground!
 Now what’s the matter?!lf you don’t fight me, I’ll kill that girl!
 Darn it!
 Multi-Shadow Clone Jutsu!
 Wind Style!
 Infinite Sandstorm Devastation!
 This isn’t good…He really got me.
 First, I’ll toy with youwithout killing you!
 I look forward to seeingwhen and how you give up
 and abandon your friends!
 Naruto…
 But…what is it?
 It’s far from over!
 N-Naruto…
 What is this…this feeling?
 Sand Shuriken!
 D-Dang it!
 Dang it!
 H-He's…
 What is this?!This feeling that’s overcoming me?
 Naruto…!
 For some reason…I don’t want to lose to this guy…
 You…
 …even if I die!
 Everyone makes mistakeslt’s nothing to be ashamed about
 Don’t let this scar be for naughtWalk with a smile
 Yes, breathe in the airLift your face to the sky and jump
 If it rains, take a breakGo where the wind takes you
 So many regretsDon’t let this scar be for naught
 Let’s go carve the badges in our chestYes, it’s Show Time, life begins now.
 Everyone makes mistakes It’s nothing to be ashamed about
 Don’t let this scar be for naughtWalk with a smile
 Transform sadness into the windand continue to forge on
 Forge on strong
 Hear! Hear! Hear! Hear!
 If you're far away,listen well.
 If you’re closer,then come and watch it!
 Among all the Genin in the Leaf,
 I’m the only one who’ssuited to become Hokage!
 I turn the biggest pinchinto opportunity
 with Transform Jutsu, Summoning Jutsu,and Shadow Clone Jutsu.
 I give back twice as muchwhen I receive a punch.
 I’m the hyperactive knucklehead Ninja!
 This is the start of the spiraling seriesof Naruto’s Ninja Handbook!
 Next time: “Naruto’s Ninja Handbook”

script:
Hey boys, listen up!
 Humans aren’t such a big deal
 Who needs tomorrow anyway,
 so don’t hide your fists
 You’re not old enough
 to sell your dreams away to uncertainty
 Hey boys, you’re the only ones
 who can pull the trigger in your heart
 All the kids said
 We’re living in this senseless, ridiculous,
 awesome world right at this moment,
 All the kids said
 Don’t forget every truth or lie
 All the kids said
 We’re way too young to die
 In this empty town lined with empty faces
 All the kids took off
 into this windless night
 Because they want to change something
 The End of Tears
 By special…
 By special,you meant that?!
 I don’t feel like I’m gonna lose.
 Sasuke…you…
 If they continue to be releasedfor a long period of time,
 Curse Marks will progressivelyeat your body.
 When they have entirelyeaten you…
 you will lose yourself…forever.
 This body…
 It looks like there’s no time to waste.
 I don’t have any feelingin my left arm…
 That power you have…
 seems to involvesome risks too, huh?
 Did you know…?
 That this place…
 is called the Final Valley.
 I think this is the perfect stage,don’t you think…Naruto?
 Oh yeah…
 I said there’d beno more talking, didn’t I?
 Well, in that case,how about we bring it to a close…?
 This battle.
 All our battles up to now!
 Next for Squad Seven.Naruto Uzumaki!
 Sakura Haruno!
 Yipeee!
 With Naruto…?
 And Sasuke Uchiha.
 Yipeee!
 With Sasuke…?
 Try not to slow me down, loser.
 You…!
 But…but…but…you told us…
 That’s why they……
 Aren’t we a three-man squad?
 That’s right! We three are one!
 Hey!
 Are you hurt? 					Scaredy Cat?
 Hey…are you hurt?Scaredy Cat?
 You are one of the onesI want to fight.
 Sasuke!
 I want…to fight you, too.
 I don’t want to seeany more deaths
 of my precious comrades.
 Summoning Jutsu!
 I…will protect Sakura!
 What’s so funny?
 Nothing’s funny, believe it!I'm happy!
 When I think I can finallybeat you here!
 What did you say?!Don't talk foolish, you failure!
 I’m not going to bea failure forever!
 Just bring it, now!
 Put on your headband before that!I’ll wait.
 I don’t need such a thing…
 Just do it!
 You wouldn’t even be ableto put one wound on my forehead!
 You’re wrong!
 I’m saying this is a testament
 to fighting on equal termsas a Leaf Shinobi!
 Naruto!
 Sasuke!
 I’ll win no matter what!
 Don’t flatter yourself!
 Stop it!
 And from this time onward…
 Chidori!
 Rasengan!
 – Rasengan! 					– Chidori!
 – Chidori! 					– Rasengan!
 This Chakra…
 This isn’t good!
 Naruto…
 I…
 It’s started to rain!Will it erase the scent?
 No problem.
 We’re already close.This way.
 Was I too late…?
 Naruto!
 Why did things come to this?!
 This is Sasuke’s…
 I didn’t make it in time…please forgive me.
 Naruto…
 I know the kind of person you are…
 You must have madea desperate effort.
 Sasuke…
 That’s my boy…
 With me, you’re allyour father talks about…
 You are my one and only brother.
 I will continue to be for you…
 a wall that you must finda way to cross over.
 Even if you were to hate me…
 You are someone
 who can obtain Mangekyo Sharinganjust like me…
 However, on one condition.
 Your closest friend…
 The Final Valley…
 To think that Sasuke and Narutowould battle it out here…
 How ironic…
 Yeah…
 When I look atthe flow of this water,
 it’s as if I’m being confrontedby an eternal, never-ending battle…
 Just like the fate of the two peopledepicted in these statues here
 who founded the Village Hiddenin the Leaves…
 Naruto and Sasuke,as long as you both live…
 You have to kill…
 your closest friend!
 I'm not gonna…
 abide by everything you say!
 I will get my hands on powerdoing it my own way!
 I will surpass youdoing it my own way!
 Without fail!
 The rain’s…let up, hasn’t it?
 Yeah.
 With that much rain,
 I won’t be able to pursuethe scent anymore.
 Naruto is more important nowthan pursuing Sasuke.
 Yeah.
 It’s gotten interesting, hasn’t it?
 Yeah…
 When I recalled the parts one by one,
 I felt as thoughI had understood everything
 Faded words which I kept so close to me
 Speechless nights, a hint of warmth,
 and this distant yearning for you
 I live, simply repeating this cycle
 Held in my two handsA droplet of time
 Softly clutching forgotten memoriesLost words
 I’ll keep these thoughts…
 I’m sorry.I’m really sorry, Sakura.
 I made a once-in-a-lifetime promisethat I would bring Sasuke back.
 But, I’m not finished yet!
 I’ll fulfill my promise,no matter what!
 Since that was whatI was always saying…
 that I won’t go back on my word.
 That’s my Way of Ninja!
 Next episode:“The Promise That Could Not Be Kept”
