script:
Rock away your existence,
 Shouting that you are here…
 A new journey begins now.
 As we survived throughthe changing seasons,
 we gained knowledge and strength,(just looks like a survival game)
 But the forgotten memories,
 of the feelings abandoned withinthe flows of time,
 have also been lost.
 When sinking down,we learned loneliness.
 But now we’ve met each other,we are no longer alone.
 Unveil your feelings,Those high emotions
 Those tears will change your fate.
 Pound your heartbeatagainst the darkness,
 We’re sure to meet,Under the same flag of pain
 Laughing Shino
 Shino! 					Let’s rest a little!
 I’m tired from doing nothing butwalk since this morning, believe it!
 You’re okay whileyou can say you are tired.
 It’s because you still haveenergy left to talk.
 Nothing but quibbling as usual…
 Man, I’m unlucky.
 To be stuck on a mission alonewith Shino.
 Hey, old lady.
 Is Motoyoshi Village still far ahead?
 Are you going to Motoyoshi Village?
 Yeah!
 Then you’ll be right thereonce you cross this path.
 Really? Thank goodness.
 But exercise great caution…
 Huh?
 Dead people also laughin Motoyoshi Village…
 It will be all over ifyou’re lured into laughing.
 Naruto.
 It’s Motoyoshi Village.
 We never imagined it at this time…
 To think that in this village…
 an incident too terrifying toeven talk about would occur…
 In Mourning
 I’m Futa Kagetsu, the chief mourner.
 I’m Shino Aburame.
 I’m Naruto Uzumaki!
 Will		Getting right down to business…
 This is the will of my father,Tobei Kagetsu.
 What’s this?!
 My eldest son, Futa Kagetsu,
 shall inherit the entireKagetsu family estate…
 HOWEVER…
 A funeral is to be held tomorrowin Motoyoshi Village
 for the head of the Kagetsu familythat owns that stretch of mountains.
 I’d like you two to go.
 Funeral security, huh?Naruto can’t do it.
 What do you mean?!
 It’s because you havethe most inappropriate face
 in the Leaf Village.
 Say what?!
 I think so as well.
 But there’s nobody else.
 So I reluctantly decidedto add Naruto.
 You’ll be the main guyon this mission, Shino.
 You're probably the best suitedfor this mission.
 Huh?
 As it happens,
 there’s one more important missionin addition to security.
 You’ll understand whenyou see the will.
 However, in the event that Futa raiseshis voice in laughter at the funeral,
 he shall lose inheriting rightsand upon consultation,
 the estate shall be divided up betweenthe bereaved family members excluding Futa.
 This will doesn’t make any sense at all…
 An abundance of medicinal herbscan be picked in the mountains
 owned by the Kagetsu family.
 I would have no trouble gettingby for the rest of my life
 if I were to inherit the estate.
 But all that will all go down the drainjust by laughing at the funeral!
 There’s no doubt that the relativeswill be in a frenzy
 trying to get me to laugh tomorrow.
 To be honest,
 I don’t have the confidenceto withstand it.
 But there is one salvation!
 According to the will,
 it’s acceptable if I, the chief mourner,were to appoint a substitute!
 And so I commissioned the Leaf!
 I asked for someone whoabsolutely will not laugh!
 This is no doubt the perfect missionfor Shino.
 I’ve never seenthis guy laugh before.
 Indeed, I leave it to you.
 I understand.
 Big Brother, dinner’s ready.
 This is my little sister Mai,the youngest.
 She lived together withmy father in this large home.
 She was also the one at his deathbedduring his final moments.
 Mai, this is Shino and Naruto.
 Nice to meet you…
 Let’s eat!
 Wait!
 First, I’ll taste for poison.
 Taste for poison…?!
 I don’t think there would be anyoneamong the relatives
 who would go that far…
 But you can never be too careful.
 You’ve got a point.
 Will you be all right, Shino?
 No problem.Even if it did contain poison,
 the Parasitic Insects inmy body will dissolve it for me.
 Parasitic…lnsects?
 How is it?
 It's all right…
 Shino…laughed?!
 He seems to be in very high spirits.Which means the food is fine…
 Don’t eat!
 Shino laughing likethis is definitely strange, believe it!
 There’s a laughing drug in this food!
 Who cooked the food?
 I did.
 But the back door isn’t locked…
 So anyone could get in if they wanted to.
 To think there would besomeone in the family
 who would go so far as to poison!
 Oh, no…The drug has gotten to the insects!
 No good…They can’t dissolve the drug.
 Then what will we do aboutthe funeral tomorrow?!
 This is a sight that doesn’t seemof this world, believe it!
 Naruto!
 Even if we were tocontact the village now,
 we wouldn’t be in time…for the funeral…
 So Naruto!
 You…
 will have to participate in the funeralas the chief mourner’s substitute!
 No way…
 Naruto.
 I’m very uneasy, but I’ll be counting on you.
 I’m also very uneasy, believe it…
 Will you knock it off?! I can’t sleep!
 You’re early, Tsukiko.
 You’re already here, huh?
 It’s dad’s funeral, after all.I came here in great haste.
 Who’s that kid?
 This is Naruto whom I’ve asked tobe my substitute as chief mourner
 since I’m not feeling so well.
 Nice to meet you!
 That’s how it’s going to be,so I will be leaving just with the greetings.
 I see. But it sure is a troublesome will.
 To think you can’t inherit the estateif you laugh at the funeral…
 Be careful.
 She’s my immediate younger sisterin question, Tsukiko.
 Five years ago,she married into the next village over…
 But she’s probably the oneafter this estate the most.
 That kid will be a cinch.
 Each and every one of them…looks greedy…
 What’s that…?
 The monk has arrived.
 Why choose a monk like this,of all people?
 I have no knowledge of this!
 It’s a different person fromthe monk at the meeting.
 Don’t laugh…
 Don’t laugh…
 Laugh… Laugh… Laugh…
 Now then, allow me to begin.
 What was that sound?
 Wasn’t it the wind blowing?
 Naruto, did you not raise your voiceand laugh just now?
 No, I didn’t!I didn’t laugh at all, believe it!
 Mai, you heard it, right?
 I don’t know…
 I only heard the sound ofbarrels falling over.
 Well, fine.
 The funeral has only just begun.
 There are still plenty of chances…
 After all, the opponent is this kidwith a stupid look.
 I’m saved…
 Shino, huh? Thanks!
 That was a close shave…
 In order, please.
 Then I’ll go first.
 Laugh… Laugh… Laugh…
 No good… He won’t laugh at that...
 I’ll give it one more push.
 Don’t laugh…!
 I must not laugh!
 This kid is nothing.
 I’ll kill him with laughter withthat technique of mine…
 This guy also intends ondoing something, huh?
 No matter what he does,no way will I laugh!
 Kiyoyasu!
 –Kiyoyasu! 					–Kiyoyasu is…
 Here it comes…
 Whatever he hits me with. I…!
 I must not laugh!
 Laugh… Laugh… Laugh…
 A flower came out…
 Don’t laugh…!
 Laugh… Laugh… Laugh…
 Don’t laugh, don’t laugh, don’t laugh…
 Laugh… Laugh… Laugh…
 I won’t laugh…no matter what!
 He’s pretty tough…
 But how long can he hold on for?
 We’ll make him laugh by the timethe funeral ends without fail!
 That…old woman…
 Dead people also laughin Motoyoshi Village…
 It will be all over if you’re luredinto laughing.
 What’s she doing in a place like this?
 Who’s there?!
 Uh, oh!
 Oh, it’s you Mai…
 With this, it’s over!We’ll put this in everyone’s tea!
 But…
 Everything will go well with this!
 I don’t know about that.
 Who’re you?!
 Shino…
 I heard everything…
 How frustrating…
 If this guy would just laugh,I’d get some of the estate…
 Thank you indeed for today.Allow me to thank you all…
 in place of the chief mourner.
 With this, the mission is complete…
 It looks like it will somehowend all right.
 Once the monk goes home,the funeral will be over.
 Please wait!
 Please let my husband saythank you as well. Okay, dear.
 Hi! Thanks for coming today.
 Huh?
 Huh?
 Wh-What’s he going to do?!
 It was a very nice funeral.I was so moved!
 It’s tear-jerking.
 That Tsukiko…To think she would go this far.
 Naruto, if you can get through this,it will be over.
 Please withstand it…!
 It doesn’t hurt at all!
 I must remember something sadat a time like this!
 Why do I think of the Pervy Sageat a time like this?!
 All right, now is the timeto finish him off.
 This is awful!The tears are causing my face to collapse.
 What’re you talking about?
 Your face…is right here!
 N-No!
 Oh, no…
 Yes!
 What?
 D–Dad…
 You’re alive? Dad?!
 Stop it, Big Brother, Big Sister!
 Dad hates fighting!
 I’ve thought up a good joke.
 I’ve thought up a good joke, too.
 Who’re those kids…?Where’d they come from?
 I’d get dad to laugh, first!
 I will be the first! You stay out of it!
 Stop it! Fighting’s wrong!
 It’s as Mai says.Fighting’s wrong! Wrong.
 Futa! Tsukiko!
 –Futa?! 					–Tsukiko?!
 N-Now that you mention it…
 Yeah…They are indeed usfrom our childhood!
 Oh, fighting’s wrong! A kettle’s a kettle!
 My mom dislikes ponkan mandarins!
 Groping is wrong!Hot sake is where it’s at.
 My wife’s secret stash is kept in a safe.
 Between my legs…
 Ding, dong, ding.
 Yeah, ding-dong-ding.Yeah, ding-dong-ding.
 Yeah, ding-dong-ding.Yeah, ding-dong-ding.
 Yeah, ding-dong-ding.
 Ding-dong.
 –That’s right…–Ding-dong. Ding-dong.
 –When we were kids…–Ding. Yeah, ding-dong-ding.
 –Dad made us laugh a lot–Ding-dong-ding.
 –with his silly jokes…–Ding-dong.
 –lt’s been a long time–Ding. Ding.
 –since I laughed at dad’s jokes…–Dong-dong-dong. Dong
 –Dong-dong–This is it! This is what I wanted to see!
 Dad!
 Then who’s this?
 The laughter stopped.
 Shino!
 I’m sorry, everyone!
 But I didn’t think you’d all comeif it weren’t my funeral…
 Mai helped me out a bunchand this was the plan.
 Is that really you, Dad? You’re alive.
 Why’d you do this?!
 In the old days,before we knew that
 the medicinal herbs we could pickin the mountains would be profitable…
 We were poor…
 But we were bursting with laughter.
 However, we got rich from sellingthe medicinal herbs at a high price.
 And when we’d open our mouths,
 we’d start saying,“Money! Money! Money!”
 And the smiles vanished fromeveryone’s faces.
 I wanted everyone to rememberwhat’s important.
 I wanted to get backthe family’s smiling faces!
 If I wrote that ridiculous will,
 everyone would do stupid thingstrying to get Futa to laugh.
 And then not only Futa,but everyone would laugh and have fun…
 Happiness isn’t money!
 It’s living while getting alongwith everyone and laughing!
 I remember…
 Sure enough, laughter is important.
 That’s right…
 To be honest, I’m sick of livingat the mercy of money.
 You liar! You’re the one sayingmoney this and money that the most.
 There are different kinds of “money,”and what I was talking about was…
 This bell.
 Could that be…?
 It’s the laughing drug.
 It’s still at experimental stage, though.
 If I made it okay to appointa substitute chief mourner,
 Futa would summon someonewho definitely wouldn’t laugh.
 So I tested it out on that person first.
 I was going to make everyone laughby putting this in everyone’s tea
 if nobody had laughed bythe end of the funeral.
 But…
 There’s no point to laughterusing a drug…
 It’s because the peoplewouldn’t be laughing
 from the bottom of their hearts.
 Instead, they’d be crying in their hearts…
 Like me right now!
 So at the end of the day,what happened with the mission?
 It's probably a success.
 It’s because the Lady Hokage probablyknew about the real mission.
 Say-say.
 You transformed into that old man, right?
 Then the “Between my legs,ding-dong-ding” thing was something you…
 Forget about that.
 Absolutely forget about that.
 O-Okay, got it.
 Then, fine.
 Sure enough, I…
 I can’t get used to this guy…
 Yesterday’s Call Sign,was all from my cell phone.
 In a strange park,I play the Fuzz Guitar without enthusiasm.
 Yellow Moon.
 Even now, counting to three,I open my eyes
 Shadow Moon I am still dreaming.
 Look at my eyes, look at my eyes,as we face one another’s back
 Look at my eyes, when can we meet?
 EveryDay EveryNightWith every word I can think of
 Right away, my messy feelings as is,
 A magical chord change, in a restless city
 A daily JAZZ Guitar playedin a soft minor key
 The mission this time around isa commission from the Land of Greens
 and is protection forsome traveling merchants.
 This is just a D-rank mission.
 Don’t complain. The castle lord thereis a benefactor of mine.
 Make sure you do nothing wrong.
 I could manage a mission likethat asleep, believe it.
 Very well.
 However, I’ve got an important reminderfor you.
 Reminder?
 Make sure you don’t forget to take thiswith you to the site.
 That is all.
 Next time:“Open for Business!		The Leaf Moving Service.”

script:
Fly into the wavy and twisted sky,into your hands
 The distance created between usbecame too big,
 because we were always together
 Your honest reply, “See you…”
 coming from that brash mouthmakes it sadder.
 If you are in an unfamiliar town, crying
 Then I want to deliver you a smile,even if I’m not by your side
 Fly into the wavy and twisted sky,into your hands
 I can feel it so close,
 Our two hearts
 Who are you guys?
 They want to fight, it seems.
 I won’t be fooled. 					You…you…
 Todoroki!
 Stop it, Todoroki!
 You said you were going to deliverGantetsu to the capital, right?
 This guy… There’s no wayI’ll forgive this guy!
 What are you talking about?
 This guy…killed my family…he killed my little brother!
 Wh-What was that…?
 Gantetsu killed your family?
 Yeah.
 Five years ago.
 I’m positive thatthis is the guy I saw.
 Fire…!
 Oh!
 This is horrible…
 Is anybody still inside?
 Damn!
 Father! Mother!
 Akio.
 Akio!
 Memory of Flames
 Akio…
 Todoroki, I found out whoattacked your family.
 Really?
 A gang of bandits calledthe Ninja Dropouts.
 Ninja Dropouts?
 They’re ruthless…Evil personified…
 When they rob the victimsof money and valuables…
 They massacre everyone in that house.
 Why?
 So as not to leave any witnesses behind.
 The bodies of your parentswere found but…
 The fire spread quickly andAkio was still small so…
 Probably nothing of him remained.
 I’m sorry, but you need tolet your little brother go…
 That’s impossible.
 I can't do that.
 Damn it!
 It’s ironic, isn’t it…
 When I finally find the killerof my parents and little brother…
 My mission…forces meto escort him to the capital.
 Todoroki.
 I’m a full-fledged police officer now.I’m not a spring chicken!
 I didn’t mean to bringmy personal grudges onto the job…
 This guy will eventuallybe sentenced to death…
 That thought has allowed me to endure.
 But, right now,right in front of my eyes…
 The same face in the flame…The face that killed my little brother!
 Your…little brother?!
 Die, Gantetsu!
 –Don’t get in my way!–Stop!
 He’s a thug who’s killedcountless innocent people.
 It’s your mission to deliver Gantetsuto the capital, right?!
 It doesn’t matter!He killed my little brother!
 It may be true that Gantetsu is evil, but…
 You can’t do that…
 There’s nobody watching…
 That’s right, here in the middleof this forest.
 H-Hey, Todoroki?
 Nobody’s watching…There’s no way they’ll know.
 Todoroki… I said, calm down!I’m telling you, I’m watching!
 No, nobody’s watching…
 Todoroki!
 As long as you keep your mouth shut…
 No… Better yet, if you weren’t around…
 Wait a second!
 What the heck are you thinking?Calm down!
 I'm extremely calm.
 You too must…
 It can’t be helped…
 If things come to this,I guess I have no choice but to fight!
 What’s the matter?
 Why don’t you just comeright out and fight?!
 You guys, too! Why don’t you stop hiding?Come out and show yourselves!
 Huh?
 Y-You guys are…
 Stop bullying Gantetsu!
 Give Gantetsu back!
 What is this?
 I have no idea…Who the heck are they?
 Everybody!
 W-Wait a minute…
 How are you connectedto Gantetsu…?
 Stop that!
 Let’s get out of here!
 Calm down.
 We should be able tounderstand each other
 if we just try to talk things over.
 You guys aren’t Shinobi, are you?!
 It’s dangerous for amateursto hold blades!
 Lee, what are we gonna do?
 This is a problem…
 ‘Cause if our opponents are amateurs,we can’t go all out…
 Shadow Clone Jutsu!
 Damn it! Let go of me!
 I need to avenge the deathsof my family…and my little brother!
 Calm down!
 Calm down and think aboutthis whole thing again!
 Your…little brother?
 Don’t be stupid, Gantetsu…Don’t come over here right now!
 Gantetsu!
 What's going on?!
 Damn it, I can’t move!
 It’s futile.
 That string is stronger than steel.
 There’s no way you’ll be ableto cut through it
 with human strength alone.
 Who the heck are you?
 I’m Monju, a Ninja Dropout.
 Ninja Dropout you said?
 I, Monju will take Gantetsu.
 As long as I have him,I have no more business with you guys.
 Those nets will shrinkas the temperature rises.
 So you’ll suffer till the end.
 In half an hour or so…
 It will cut you into pieces.
 Farewell!
 Todoroki!
 Gantetsu!
 Damn it… I’m not about to diein a place like this.
 Our mission is to deliverGantetsu to the capital…
 Are you an idiot ?Take a good look at this situation!
 We’ll be goners before that happens.
 I don’t believe that those Ninja Dropoutsare Gantetsu’s comrades.
 Gantetsu was telling the truth.Those guys might kill Gantetsu.
 That’s why I should have killed himwith my own hands!
 But remember, that guy wascalling out your name to the very end!
 So what’s up with that?!
 There must be somethinghe wanted to tell you!
 I don’t want to hearany excuses from a thug!
 I find it hard to believe thatGantetsu’s that evil a guy.
 What was that?!
 I’m telling you,I’m not about to kick the bucket
 until I’ve heard what Gantetsuwanted to say!
 Stop it!
 Hey, I’m positive we can workthings out if we just talk.
 Shut up!
 Wait. 					Let’s stop this.
 I just assumed you were a Ninja Dropout,because you’re a Ninja.
 We’re Shinobi from the Leaf Village.
 We were called here to bepart of the police escort
 taking Gantetsu to the capital.
 Please spare Gantetsu.
 That can’t happen.
 Gantetsu saved us fromthe Ninja Dropouts.
 Saved you?
 Who in the world are you guys?
 We’re all kids whose familieswere killed by the Ninja Dropouts.
 But Gantetsu secretly rescued us
 because he wanted to saveat least the children…
 What was that?!
 Gantetsu took care of all of us kidswho had become orphans…
 Gantetsu.
 Is it the Ninja Dropouts again?
 I’m sorry.
 Where am I?
 So you woke up.
 Mother…? Father…?
 Where’s Mother?
 You poor thing…But we’re all in the same boat.
 You’re not alone…We’re here for you…
 We’re your new family.
 I’m leaving the Ninja Dropouts!
 I can’t stand this any longer.
 I can’t commit robberies withthose guys anymore.
 But if you don’t,they’ll kill you, Gantetsu.
 I’ll steal their money.
 Huh?
 And I’ll get myself capturedby the police.
 Come on…
 If I do that,
 they’ll show up in front ofthe prison to try to get me back.
 That’s the only waythey can be captured.
 Are you saying you’re gonnabe a decoy…?
 It's so that there won’t beany more victims.
 This is my only choice.
 Gantetsu really did steal their moneyand was captured by the police.
 We came to this forest
 because we were worriedabout Gantetsu’s safety.
 We were praying that the Ninja Dropoutswould get caught. However…
 So Gantetsu reformed himself
 and betrayed the Ninja Dropouts, right?
 We have to do something aboutthe real evil, the Ninja Dropouts!
 I don’t really care aboutthe Ninja Dropouts right now.
 What’s important is thatwe rescue Gantetsu.
 I’m guessing that Gantetsuis with Naruto.
 Don’t worry because he won’t havebeen captured by the Ninja Dropouts.
 Okay, let’s believe that.
 Damn…
 If things continue like this,we’ll turn into dried fish.
 Huh?
 H-Hey… It loosens up a littlewhen sweat soaks into it.
 What?
 Are you serious?
 Oh, you’re right.
 Yeah, I know…
 What?!
 I’m used to its venom.lt’s nothing.
 I find it hard to believethat Gantetsu’s that evil a guy.
 I’m gonna meet up with Gantetsuone more time
 and find out for myself,no matter what it takes…
 That’s right…I need to see Gantetsu again, too.
 I will then avenge the deathsof my family…and of my little brother.
 We did it!
 That was a narrow escape!
 All right… Let’s hurry up andrescue Gantetsu!
 Yeah… I will find him no matter whatand I'll cut him down!
 Huh?
 –Gantetsu. 					–Huh?
 That’s definitely Gantetsu.
 Those guys are…
 I-Idiot…
 –Gantetsu! 					–Gantetsu!
 Gantetsu!
 That’s as far as you’ll go, kid.
 That guy is…
 Don’t tell me he’s a Ninja Dropout?!
 Good answer.
 I’m Monju, a Ninja Dropout.
 Give Gantetsu back!
 I’m not forgiving you for this!
 Hey, hey…
 Who are these little brats?
 Perhaps they’re inexperiencedin the ways of the world, but…
 to tell me to give Gantetsu back…
 Give us back what we want.That’s our line, right?
 Who the heck are you guys?
 You Ninja Dropout jerks…
 We are avenging our families’ deaths!
 What?!
 You brats just stay quiet.
 Damn it!
 Stop! Monju! Let that kid go!
 It looks like you don’t quite comprehendthe position you’re in right now, huh?!
 And moreover, what do they meanby avenge, huh, Gantetsu?!
 Stop!
 Ninja Art: Mesh Cage!
 It’s my turn!
 It doesn’t even budge.
 It’s useless… You won’t be able totear through this net.
 Come on, Gantetsu, answer me.
 I refuse.
 Huh… I see.
 Then how about this?
 Akio!
 Stop it! I get it.I’ll talk, so please stop!
 You should have done thatfrom the start.
 These children are the childrenfrom the homes
 that we, the Ninja Dropouts, attacked.
 I rescued them and gave them shelter.
 What? You betrayed us?
 I see… You jerk…
 You took our treasures andgave them to these guys.
 They belonged to their familiesin the first place.
 Don’t mess around with me…You traitor!
 Stop that!
 Sorry to have kept you waiting!
 Naruto Uzumaki has just arrived!
 Naruto!
 Naruto, you were safe!
 Of course I was!
 I’m not handing Gantetsu overto you no matter what!
 Gantetsu.
 That’s…
 It can’t be…!
 The Key to the rusted heart’s door
 Will always be smiling right near by
 Even if rains of spears were to fall,I will run through it
 Because I want to find the joywithout a shape
 This big dream of mine thatcannot be translated to words,
 I will make it come true,even if it were to deepen my wounds
 We stand here today because ofwhat we believed through,
 That is why I will continue running forward,never looking away
 Even if I’m told thatthere is no bright future
 I’ll change it right away,lighting it with all my feeling
 The wind is probably testing our hearts
 In my heart, I gently grasped my hands
 You are probably searching forthe answer to your tears
 Your dream is always waiting near by,with the answers in its hands
 The Key to the rusted heart’s door
 Will always be smiling right near by
 Is that the Ninja Dropout’s hideout?
 Yes, Akio is probably in that mansion.
 Damn those Ninja Dropout bastards.I can never forgive them.
 How dare they interfere withthe happy reunion of the siblings!
 This is outrageous.
 All right, let’s go, Bushy-Brows!
 I’m always okay to go.Even if the enemy is an ex-Shinobi…
 We’re going to beat them one and all,
 and definitely going to getTodoroki’s brother back!
 Next time: “To Each His Own Path”

script:
We are Fighting Dreamers aiming high
 Fighting Dreamersdon't care what people think about them
 Fighting Dreamersfollow what they believe
 Oli Oli Oli Oh! Just go my way
 Right here right now (Bang)Hit it straight like a line drive!
 Right here right now (Burn)
 Down a difficult roadfilled with endless struggles
 Where do you think you are goingfollowing someone else's map?
 An insightful crow comes alongto tear up the map
 Now open your eyes andtake a look at the truth (Yeah!)
 There's nothing to lose,so let's GO!!!
 We are Fighting Dreamers aiming high
 Fighting Dreamersdon't care what people think about them
 Fighting Dreamersfollow what they believe
 Oli Oli Oli Oh!Just go my way
 Right here right now (Bang)Hit it straight like a line drive!
 Right here right now (Burn)We're gonna do it and do our best!
 Right here right now (Bang)Hit it straight like a line drive!
 Right here right now (Burn)We're gonna do it and do our best! BANG!
 A Dubious Offer!Tsunade's Choice
 Not good…
 Dang it! Dang it!This time for sure…no matter what!
 You’re the only one who can treatLord Orochimaru’s arms.
 Why don’t we make a deal?
 I’ll resurrect the little brotherand man, both of whom you loved…
 with the Forbidden Jutsu I’ve developed.
 Don’t you want to see those two,Tsunade…?
 No! You must not believein their sweet talk…
 Their wishes…Moreover, Tsunade, your wishes…
 And dreams…Did you forget them?!
 I’ll be straight with you.
 Tsunade, the village has demandedthat you become the Fifth Hokage.
 The successive line of Hokages
 have protected the Leaf Villageand those living in it.
 They brought troubled times under control
 and helped the village to prosper.
 They risked their lives forthis dream, this ideal!
 You don’t have to answer right now.
 However, I want it in a week.
 Also, two human sacrifices areneeded for this Forbidden Jutsu,
 so do what you need to doto prepare them.
 We are starting!
 C’mon. Place your bets!
 Which will you bet on, ma’am?
 Which one? C’mon!
 Which one will she choose?
 If she agrees to our conditions,
 your arms will be healed,
 and the destruction of the Leaf Villagewill continue immediately.
 Lady Tsunade will also be able tobe reunited with the two whom she loves.
 But if she doesn’t agree…
 I’ll have to force her to heal my arms…
 Will it really be that easy?
 I have you.
 There’s no need to worry.
 I’m the one who knows her the best.
 And her greatest weakness!
 She’ll definitely accept the conditions…Definitely!
 Listen, in this third step,
 you’ve got to use 100%of what you have learned…
 And retain them.
 In other words,
 imagine creating a single layerwithin the balloon
 and compressing the Chakra inside it.
 I know that in my head…
 But no matter what,
 I can’t completely hold 100%of my power in a neat ball…
 Don’t give him false hope by teaching himsomething he can't master.
 That’s why the moony kidstarts joking about becoming a Hokage!
 Tomorrow, huh.
 Come again, okay?
 I certainly will!
 Are you going to meetOrochimaru again?
 To think she’d be that shaken up…
 Something extreme must have happened.
 That one week bugs me, somehow…
 And Naruto hasn’t come backto the inn for nearly a week.
 I guess I’ll press Tsunade a little more.
 No good…
 No good… Why?
 Here there’s no time…lt’ll be too late.
 What’s this…?!
 What happened, Naruto?!
 Are you okay?
 What do you want?
 The moon’s out.
 How about going out for a drink?
 Tomorrow will be the one weekyou promised to Naruto.
 I wonder what became of Naruto?
 Beats me.
 I guess I’ll have something.
 Radish, please.
 Coming up.
 Oh?
 Here you go.
 Ooh! This looks good.
 Lady Tsunade!
 What happened to Naruto?
 He’s quite exhausted and weakened.
 And his right hand is severely burnedwith Chakra…
 As it stands now,
 this kid probably won’t wake upuntil the day after tomorrow.
 It’s as Jiraiya says…
 Why did I make such a stupid bet?
 What am I, of all people,getting so worked up for?
 How stupid.
 Tomorrow…
 Please don’t go tomorrow!
 Why don’t you say anything?!
 Lady Tsunade! Please don’t be silent.Please answer!
 If you say that you’re going…
 What will you do?
 I’ll stop you with my life!
 Shizune… Have you forgottenwho you’re talking to?
 Sir! It’s morning, now!lt’s about time you went home!
 Geez.
 Hey! Get up, sir…
 Hey! What’s wrong, you?!
 It’ll be troublesome if we’re disturbedduring the negotiations…
 What do you want me to do?
 It might be good to kill…Tsunade’s attendant.
 It seems that you…
 You don’t trust me completely…yet.
 Precisely because I trust you…
 I would like to leave Sasukein your hands.
 Well, then…
 Kabuto…
 If you wish to stop me…
 You have no choicebut to kill young Sasuke, now.
 You can’t possibly kill me…
 Hey!
 I said hey!
 Naruto…?
 Oh no! What time is it?No, what day is it?
 It’s Monday…
 What is it?
 Is your body okay?
 As I recall, you were supposedto sleep for two full days…
 No matter what the wound,
 I’m always able to recoverif I sleep one night!
 That’s right.This kid has Nine-Tailed Fox’s power…
 More importantly,where’s that stupid old woman?!
 Today’s the promised bet day.
 Then, what about the Jutsu…
 It’s still not complete, but I can wing it…Believe it!
 That’s right. This isn’t the time for this.
 – Naruto, please stay…– Huh?
 You are…!
 What?! Oh!
 Wait, Shizune!
 That darned Tsunade spiked my drink.
 I can’t build up my Chakra well…
 And my body is so numb,I can barely throw a Kunai Knife.
 What was he gonna doif that had hit me?!
 That’s lame! Here you’re always braggingabout how you’re this awesome Ninja!
 And you’re nailed by her perverted attack?You, Pervy Pervy Sage?!
 Shut up!
 Even if she’s rotten,she’s still a medical specialist.
 She’s the only one who could concocta tasteless and odorless drug for Ninja.
 But to think I’d be caught off-guard,
 no matter how intoxicated I was…
 I’m going to kill you, bastard!
 How are you feeling,Master Jiraiya?
 Quite a bit better than this morning I guess.
 But be that as it may,maybe around thirty percent…
 I never thought I’d end up encounteringthat Master Jiraiya in a place like this…
 Things have gotten difficult.I guess I’ll pull back for now.
 At any rate, Naruto…To think you’d be here, too…
 Hey! Shizune.
 Y-Yes?!
 It’s about time you tell me
 what the heck she was talking aboutwith Orochimaru.
 Orochimaru?!
 I wanted to believe Lady Tsunade…
 That’s why I couldn’t say until now.
 But…
 There’s no time.Please come with me!
 I’ll explain as we run!
 Okay!
 I’m going, too!
 What’s your answer?
 Say what?!
 The answer to that is definitely no!
 This might be really bad…
 She’s probably still thinkingof those two.
 Perhaps I may have no choice,but to kill Tsunade…
 Dang it!
 I’ll heal your arms…
 In exchange for that,keep your hands off the village.
 Very well.
 Now then…
 He’s planning to once again attack
 the Leaf Village ifhis arms are healed!
 The situation will geteven more dangerous than that
 if he’s not stopped now.
 Him screwing around like that!
 I have you.There’s no need to worry…
 What’s the meaning of this?
 To think you’d betray me at this point…
 Tsunade!
 I believe your promise,its a true heart give me courage
 Always I feel itthe precious time with you
 On your still shoulder
 I feel the wind that blowstowards tomorrow
 The city lights are like pieces of stars
 That hold us together
 “Each one of us glows differently,”
 you say laughingly
 but you look most dazzling
 Like a comet,
 like the rainbow after the storm
 You bring light into my heart
 Being lost can be the answer
 Let’s promise we won’t cheat
 Uh... like a shooting star,we do go ahead.
 What the hell is this?! This castlehas been destroyed even further!
 It seems Tsunade hasdeclined the deal.
 But…but the old lady is not here!
 Calm down a second.She shouldn't have gone far from here.
 Oh, some incredible noisefrom that direction, Pervy Sage!
 Well, well…she started a flashy battle.
 Naruto, we go after her!
 Right! I'm ready anytime!
 Next time: "Breakdown! The Deal is Off!"

script:
Hey boys, listen up!
 Humans aren’t such a big deal
 Who needs tomorrow anyway,
 so don’t hide your fists
 You’re not old enough
 to sell your dreams away to uncertainty
 Hey boys, you’re the only ones
 who can pull the trigger in your heart
 All the kids said
 We’re living in this senseless, ridiculous,
 awesome world right at this moment,
 All the kids said
 Don’t forget every truth or lie
 All the kids said
 We’re way too young to die
 In this empty town lined with empty faces
 All the kids took off
 into this windless night
 Because they want to change something
 Sakura's Determination
 Where’s Sasuke!Where did you put him?!
 Heh! You’re Naruto, right?
 You wouldn’t believe anythingI said anyway, would you…?
 That’s right! I won’t believethat Sasuke’s dead!
 Naruto…
 That’s right. Sasuke is alive.
 I’ll bring Sasuke back!
 I made that promise!
 Naruto…
 In that case, take me down!
 If I were the wimp I was in the past,
 I would probably havetold you the truth.
 Arashi!
 No! The old Arashi is dead!
 The person you see hereis just a block of flesh
 kept alive byNinja Art: Cadaver Puppets!
 Sakura, please look after Sasame!
 Stop it, Naruto! Don’t fight with Arashi!
 No!
 This guy isn’t the same gentle Arashiyou once knew, Sasame!
 Jigumo! Go!
 No!
 Sasame! I'm sorry!
 Over here!
 Naruto!
 Don’t, Sakura!
 Kamikiri…!
 Finish him!
 Naruto!
 You’re…next…!
 Sakura!
 That was close…
 I almost let my guard down.
 Just when you had a chanceto launch a sneak attack.
 You blew it, didn’t you, Naruto?
 Naruto!
 All because of that ball and chain…!
 Ball and chain…?!
 Naruto… I'm sorry!
 That’s not true at all!
 This kind of injury…
 is nothing…at all!
 Shadow Clone Jutsu!
 If there’s three on your side,
 I'll go with five on mine!
 Kamikiri!
 Naruto!
 Are you all right?!
 You’re badly hurt…
 Sakura… This injury is nothing!
 “Sakura…This injury is nothing!”
 Stop it! If you say more than that…!
 I won’t say more! I’ll bring this to an end.
 Kamikiri! Jigumo!
 Give me your Chakra…
 Boar, Dog, Rat,Rat, Snake, Rooster, Dog,
 Dog, Monkey, Dragon,Boar, Boar, Rat, Boar, Dragon…
 Why does Arashi know that technique?
 It’s a Hidden Jutsu that only the past chiefsof the Fuma clan could use…
 What was that?!
 Fuma Ninja Art:
 Spell of the Mandala!
 This ain’t good!
 Naruto!
 What the heck is this?!
 This is the end!
 What?!
 Naruto!
 The Chakra cage gradually shrinks…
 And the human enclosed thereinis crushed to the size of a tiny nugget.
 You can’t break it.
 As long as I myself do notdissolve the Jutsu.
 Naruto!
 I’m incapable of doing anything…
 There’s nothing I’m capable of doing…
 The person I am now isn’t…
 capable of doing anything!
 Arashi!
 Sasame…
 You!
 Sasame!
 Please…come to your senses…
 Become the old Arashi again!
 I told you, already!
 The old Arashi is dead.
 Arashi…
 I’m sorry, Sasame…
 I wanted power…
 I wanted the Fuma Clan to finda place in the sun once again…
 Yes! I understand that!I understand that!
 But, enough now…Let’s go home.
 Let’s go back to the village.
 But, I’m just a mere monster now…
 That’s not true!
 This is agony…
 Sassme…
 Please… kill me…
 Please…kill…
 How dare you try to kill me!
 Arashi!
 You’ll…die!
 Sakura!
 Sakura?!
 You wanna be… the first to die?
 Sasame taught me that…
 dying isn’t anything to be scared of!
 I see…
 But what’s scary is to live one’s lifewithout having been able to do anything…
 I’m not afraid to die in the serviceof someone who is important to me!
 Don’t!
 I’m telling you…
 Whatever happens, you mustn’t die…No matter what! Sakura!
 Naruto!
 Give it up!
 What is it you think you’re capableof doing the way you are now?!
 That’s so useless!
 Vanish from this worldget crushed into nothing…!
 Sasame!
 Stop that, Arashi!
 Sasame…you!
 Naruto!
 Hey! Let go!
 No!
 Arashi?!
 I’m sorry, Sasame…
 I caused you so much hardship…
 No, you haven’t!
 The person who experiencedthe greatest hardship is you, Arashi!
 Is there anything I can do for you?
 What should I do for you?!
 You’ve already helped memore than enough…
 See… Thanks to you, Sasame,
 I was able to return to beingthe person I was in the past…
 Naruto!
 Sakura…
 Even if it’s to be of serviceto someone…
 There’s no life thatshould be lost for that!
 Yeah!
 Run! Sakura!
 Pervy Sage!
 Sorry to be late!
 I was faced with a number of obstacleson my end too!
 Gimme a break…
 Now then…Climb on, climb on!
 Hurry! Let’s get back above ground!
 Oops!
 Sasame!
 She’s fine… She just fainted.
 Naruto!
 Orochimaru assigned us a mission…
 To make sure nobody takes Sasuke back
 to the Village Hidden inthe Leaves under any circumstances!
 Then, Sasuke is…?!
 Yeah… He’s alive!
 Orochimaru had to protect Sasuke
 because he is his vital vessel whichhe will possess in three years!
 Arashi…
 Arashi… This place is gonna collapse!
 Hurry up and come over here!
 I’m already just a puppet…
 I cannot live my life anywhereexcept here.
 Arashi…
 All right!
 No! Arashi!
 Sasame…
 Thank you.
 Including Arashi,we’ve paid an extraordinary price but…
 The Fuma Clan has beenable to cut itself free
 from Orochimaru’s spell…
 You can start again anew.
 I will rebuild the Clan again without fail!
 With this life…that Arashi protected.
 Yeah!
 I am truly indebted to you.
 Sasame…
 Hanzaki, I’m leaving these twoin your hands!
 Yes, sir!Please take care along the road!
 I will.
 – Thank you!– We thank you!
 – Take care!– See you again!
 Hey! Hang in there!
 Well, we weren’t ableto find Sasuke,
 but at least we now knowthat he’s alive somewhere…
 We’ll have to settle for the factthat we were able to ascertain
 the new information that we still havea grace period of three years
 before he becomes a vesselto be possessed by Orochimaru.
 Yes…
 Sasame knew what she neededto do for her clan…
 But this time again all I did was cry.
 All I did was depend on Naruto…
 Sakura!
 You gave your best effort too!
 No, I was just a ball and chainto everyone…
 I wasn’t capable of doinganything alone…
 That’s not true!
 Seeing you give your best effortlike that gave me a lot of courage, Sakura.
 If you hadn’t been there, Sakura,I’d have been crushed just like that.
 It’s thanks to you, Sakura!
 Naruto…
 Wow, you’ve grown into someonewho can say that sort of thing!
 Oww! I’m an injured man!Treat me with a little more care!
 Oh yeah, that’s right!
 All I was thinking about at that timewas protecting someone I cared about…
 What I’m capable ofdoing right now…
 I was thinking…
 What?
 There are many variables suchas mission level,
 or platoon’s member structure…
 But no matter how smalla platoon might be,
 I think it’s important to assignone Medical Ninja to it…
 I know that already…
 I wrote exactly the same thingin a report long ago
 regarding the survival rate and missionachievement rate of small platoons.
 But it’s not that easy tonurture Medical Ninja.
 They require a different set of skillsthan that of fighting types Ninja…
 The minute perfectionof Chakra control,
 the ability to assimilate a huge volumeof specialized knowledge,
 the brains to apply that in a broad way…patience…
 And there is the most important thing
 for Shinobi who are to developinto a Medical Ninja…
 Well, I’m busy right now, so…
 The most important thing…huh?
 Hidden Leaf Hospital		 I’m all wrapped up in bandages again…
 This way I can’t evenhold chopsticks…
 Sakura, when it’s time formy meal, feed me, okay?
 I’ll open up my mouth just like this and…
 Huh? Sakura?
 I’m sorry! I was just joking!
 I’m sorry… Naruto…
 Huh?
 This is gonna mean thatI’ll keep you waiting a little but…
 Next time, I definitely won’t…
 be a ball-and-chain to you!
 Huh?
 Enter!
 I came here with a request!
 What is it?
 Please make me your apprentice!
 You’re very desperate, aren’t you?
 Sakura Haruno,
 I heard from Kakashi that you havea brilliant mind as well as will power!
 All right.
 But in exchange,I’m not gonna be easy on you!
 Yes, ma’am!
 This recent mission…
 looks like it wasn’t wastedon her, after all.
 When I recalled the parts one by one,
 I felt as thoughI had understood everything
 Faded words which I kept so close to me
 Speechless nights, a hint of warmth,
 and this distant yearning for you
 I live, simply repeating this cycle
 Held in my two handsA droplet of time
 Softly clutching forgotten memoriesLost words
 I’ll keep these thoughts…
 He makes me so angry,that Pervy Sage!
 Didn’t he say “I’ll make youmy disciple and hone your skills”?!
 When Sakura’s already becomethe Old Lady Tsunade's
 and is working so hard!
 And he just leaves me tomy own devices! Hey!
 All because he was assigneda mission by Old Lady Tsunade!
 If things come to this,
 I’m gonna give the Old Lady Tsunadea piece of my mind!
 Next episode, “The Three Villainsfrom the Maximum Security Prison”
ners: [set(), {'Sakura'}, set(), {'Naruto'}, set(), set(), {'Sasuke'}, {'Naruto'}, {'Sasuke'}, {'Sasuke'}, set(), {'Naruto'}, set(), {'Arashi'}, set(), {'Arashi'}, set(), {'Sasame', 'Sakura'}, {'Naruto'}, {'Arashi'}, set(), {'Arashiyou', 'Sasame'}, {'Jigumo'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'Naruto'}, {'Sakura'}, set(), set(), {'Naruto'}, set(), {'Sakura'}, set(), set(), {'Naruto'}, {'Naruto'}, set(), set(), {'Naruto'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'Naruto'}, set(), {'Sakura'}, {'Sakura'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), {'Jigumo'}, {'Arashi'}, set(), set(), set(), {'Naruto'}, set(), set(), set(), {'Naruto'}, set(), set(), set(), {'Naruto'}, set(), {'Arashi'}, set(), set(), {'Arashi'}, set(), {'Arashi'}, {'Sasame', 'Arashi'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'Arashi'}, set(), {'Sakura'}, {'Sakura'}, set(), {'Sasame'}, set(), set(), set(), {'Sakura'}, {'Naruto'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'Arashi'}, set(), {'Naruto'}, set(), set(), set(), {'Arashi'}, {'Sasame'}, {'Arashi'}, set(), set(), {'Sasame', 'Naruto'}, {'Sakura'}, set(), set(), {'Sakura'}, {'Pervy'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'Naruto'}, {'Orochimaru', 'Sasuke'}, {'Sasuke'}, set(), {'Orochimaru', 'Sasuke'}, {'Arashi'}, set(), set(), {'Arashi'}, set(), {'Arashi'}, {'Sasame'}, {'Orochimaru', 'Arashi'}, set(), {'Arashi'}, set(), set(), {'Sasame', 'Hanzaki'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'Orochimaru', 'Sasuke'}, {'Sasame'}, {'Naruto', 'Sakura'}, set(), set(), {'Sakura'}, {'Sakura'}, {'Sakura'}, {'Naruto'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'Sakura', 'Hidden'}, set(), {'Sakura'}, set(), set(), {'Naruto'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), set(), {'Kakashi', 'Sakura'}, set(), set(), set(), set(), {'Pervy'}, set(), {'Sakura', "Tsunade's"}, set(), set(), {'Tsunade'}, {'Tsunadea'}, set()]

script:
Fly into the wavy and twisted sky,into your hands
 The distance created between usbecame too big,
 because we were always together
 Your honest reply, “See you…”
 coming from that brash mouthmakes it sadder.
 If you are in an unfamiliar town, crying
 Then I want to deliver you a smile,even if I’m not by your side
 Fly into the wavy and twisted sky,into your hands
 I can feel it so close,
 Our two hearts
 No way…
 To think Old Man Hokage wouldtry to eliminate Yakumo.
 No way could that ever happen!
 But if by some remote chance,
 Kurenai Senseiaccepted such a mission…
 it would explain her strange behavior.
 No, no way!No way that could ever happen.
 Are you okay, Kurenai Sensei…?
 Yes. I feel quite a bit better nowthanks to your first-aid…
 Who in the world isKurenai Sensei protecting?
 It was the Third Hokage whotold her to take custody of Yakumo…
 What in the world is her real mission…?
 What's going on?!
 Th-That's…
 Th-The Village Hidden in the Leaves is…
 No way…!
 Genjutsu or Reality?
 It’s like the aftermath ofa large war that broke out.
 Hinata!
 Right…
 Byakugan!
 There’s not a person in the village…
 What is this…?
 What’s going on here?!
 Kiba, Hinata…ls there anything unusual in the area?
 No enemy signs anywhere…
 Akamaru doesn’t sensethe scent of any outsiders, either.
 What happened in the villagewhile we were away…?
 First, let’s take Yakumo andKurenai Sensei to the hospital.
 We’ll check out the village after that…
 R-Right…!
 Leaf Hospital
 What’s this…?
 Anyway, let’s get these twoto a hospital room…
 I’m okay.More importantly, take care of Yakumo.
 Right…
 You’re out of danger now…
 Oh, no…She’s unconscious!
 Her vital signs are weakening…
 I wonder if there’s any medicine left…
 Naruto, help me look…
 Oh, well, but…
 Just hurry!
 R-Right…
 There’s no scent of blood.
 Everyone must haveevacuated somewhere.
 Let’s us check out the village.
 Right…
 Make sure you threealways act together…
 Come back here in thirty minutes,no matter what.
 Right…
 What is it?
 Sure enough, you have to be the oneto give us orders, Kurenai Sensei!
 What’s been the matter with you?!
 The pharmacy is that way.
 Nothing. I was just concernedabout Kurenai Sensei…
 So let’s hurry and get the medicine!
 I mean, Kurenai Sensei’s going to…eliminate…Yakumo…
 Eliminate?
 Th-Th-That couldn’t be…
 I was just kind of out of it.
 Huh?
 Huh…? What was that?!
 What is it, Sakura?!
 There’s someone here other than us.
 What?!
 That’s close!
 I’ll leave the two inthe hospital room to you, Sakura!
 I’m going after him!
 Got it!
 Hold it! Multi-Shadow Clone Jutsu!
 Huh?! My Jutsu won’t activate?!
 Wait! This isn’t the timeto be fighting.
 You guys are the ones whoattacked the mountain cottage, right?!
 I am Unkai of the Kurama Clan…
 Kurama?!The same clan as Yakumo?!
 Why would her clan attack her?!
 Listen to me!lf you don’t, everyone will die!
 What's this smell of blood?!
 Byakugan!
 Close your Byakugan, Hinata!
 Kiba, restrain Akamaru’ssense of smell!
 –What?! 					–What is it?!
 It’s because we’re caughtin someone’s Jutsu.
 Say what?!
 Yes. We’re now insideYakumo’s Genjutsu.
 It may seem as if the Leaf Villagewas in a war.
 But this is merelya part of her Genjutsu.
 This whole Leaf Village is Genjutsuand we’ve all been trapped in it?
 That’s totally impossible!
 But if her latent powers have awakened,it wouldn’t be hard at all.
 This whole village?!
 This ground we’re standing on,this sky, everything is Genjutsu?!
 There are occasions whensuperior senses become a hindrance.
 It’s because no matter how superiorthe sense of sight or smell might be,
 ultimately it’s the human brain thatprocesses and perceives the information!
 There are times whenwell-developed brains make errors
 in the process of interpretingcomplex electric signals.
 However, insects act onlywith sharp senses.
 Unlike the information processedwith a human brain,
 insects narrow this information downto the very minimum.
 Look. My insectsare still under control.
 They will not be deceived.
 There are occasions when
 Yakumo’s Genjutsusummons thunderclouds
 and produces fire.
 And that is planted directly intothe human brain
 as if it had occurred in reality.
 And that causes the brainto hurt one’s own body.
 Then, Grandma’s house…
 That’s also Yakumo’s power?!
 It’s not just that…
 She can even kill people easilyif she were so inclined.
 But these tremors…
 Are you saying this is also Genjutsu?
 You’ll see any moment now…
 A-A snake!
 It’s too huge!
 Is that also Genjutsu?!
 It’s a terrifying image thatour cerebrums have created.
 Physical influence is absolutely…
 unthinkable!
 No way!
 Yakumo?! Kurenai Sensei?!
 Huh?!
 Really…? Yakumo can kill peoplewith Genjutsu..?
 So is that why the Third Hokagetried to eliminate her?
 Yakumo, Yakumo?!
 Kurenai Sensei, Kurenai Sensei…
 Over here… Kurenai Sensei…
 I still can’t believe it.
 To think Yakumo would dosomething like that!
 Once every several generations,
 a child is born into our Kurama Clanwith physical idiosyncrasies.
 That child is Yakumo…
 Moreover, what’s terrifying is herusing her powers unconsciously
 without being able to control it.
 It’s getting kind of hot.
 Don’t!
 What’s happeningoutside the door…?
 Don’t open it!
 Wh-What’s this…?
 Why’s there lava here…?
 That’s an illusion our brains havecreated due to Yakumo’s Genjutsu.
 But even it’s an illusion,if we were to dive into the lava,
 our brains would determine it to be lavaand our bodies would burn up.
 That is Yakumo’s power.
 So is that why Old Man Hokageand Kurenai Sensei
 tried to eliminate Yakumo?
 That’s not it.
 What they reallyattempted to kill
 was the monsterexisting inside Yakumo.
 A monster?
 Before too long,Yakumo’s massive powers
 created a terrifying monster.
 If left alone, the monster thatcontinues to grow would
 someday attempt tobecome one with her
 by absorbingYakumo’s consciousness.
 The Third Hokage and Kurenaidetermined as such
 and all there was to do in orderto save Yakumo was to seal her powers.
 A monster in her body…
 So that’s what it was…
 I can’t just sit back like this!
 Oh!
 Oh. My entire fortune!
 I told you. If you dive into the lava,you’re body will really burn up.
 Then does that meanwe can’t get out of here?!
 No, there is one way.
 What’s that way?!
 If you seal your five senses,the Genjutsu cannot affect the body.
 You must escape from this worldand attack Yakumo!
 What?! Attack Yakumo?!
 Ow-ow-ow!
 What? This is…Satomi Hill?!
 Old Man Unkai!
 It seems you safely made itout of Yakumo’s Genjutsu…
 What the heck happened…?!
 At the point you brought Yakumoout of the mountain cottage,
 you were alreadycaught in her Genjutsu.
 What?!
 Guys! Get a hold of yourselves!
 Kiba!
 Shino!
 Wh-Where are we…?
 Sakura, examineOld Man Unkai’s wounds.
 Unkai…?
 What happened?!These are awful burns!
 We were able to get out ofYakumo’s Genjutsu
 thanks to this old man!
 Rather, I’d saywe were driven out…
 Her only target wasYuhi Kurenai, after all…
 Where’s Kurenai Sensei now?
 Well, probably…
 Yakumo…
 Kurenai Sensei…What do you think of my paintings…?
 Aren’t they wonderful?!
 What did you do to everyone?
 Don’t worry…I just drove out the intruders…
 Eventually, I must have my revengeon the Leaf Village…
 But first, I have some businesswith you, Sensei.
 Why include the Leaf Village as well…?
 I should be enough of a targetfor your revenge…!
 I won’t let you sayyou don’t know!
 How is it? 					Awesome, huh?
 I have complete control now of lettingyou live or killing you, Sensei.
 Tell me the truth…
 It was the Third Hokage who orderedmy father and mother killed and
 the Kurama Clan and me eliminatedfrom the Leaf Village, right?
 No.
 The Third Hokage did not ordersuch a mission…
 Why do you lie?!
 Please.
 Tell me the truth!
 You’ll vanish if you don’t,Kurenai Sensei…
 Such a sad child…
 If killing me will eliminate your suffering,then you should do it.
 If your hate will vanish alongwith your suffering!
 Why do you cry?I won’t be deceived by tears like that!
 1001, 1002, 1003, 1004, 1005!
 Yeah, it feels good inevery kind of weather to sweat.
 So the Kurama Clan are still here!Might Guy will take you on!
 W-Wait, Guy!
 Huh?! G-Guy?
 I see. So you guys were alsocaught in the Kurama Genjutsu…
 I’m sorry.
 Well, you’re alive andthat’s all that matters.
 Thank goodness,thank goodness.
 Oh, you guys are back!
 Where are the village reinforcements?!
 There’s no time to explain!
 What?!
 Oh, hey! Wait, you guys!
 What’s up with them?!
 Who’s that man…?And what about everyone?
 Please, just help me out, Guy Sensei.
 But, well…
 Just hurry!
 R-Right…
 Byakugan!
 Those jerks…
 No, Yakumo!
 Yakumo and Kurenai Senseiare in the innermost room.
 All right!
 Hey, wait!
 Kiba!
 The Key to the rusted heart’s door
 Will always be smiling right near by
 Even if rains of spears were to fall,I will run through it
 Because I want to find the joywithout a shape
 This big dream of mine thatcannot be translated to words,
 I will make it come true,even if it were to deepen my wounds
 We stand here today because ofwhat we believed through,
 That is why I will continue running forward,never looking away
 Even if I’m told thatthere is no bright future
 I’ll change it right away,lighting it with all my feeling
 The wind is probably testing our hearts
 In my heart, I gently grasped my hands
 You are probably searching forthe answer to your tears
 Your dream is always waiting near by,with the answers in its hands
 The Key to the rusted heart’s door
 Will always be smiling right near by
 Everyone, what’s the current situation?
 Naruto hasn’t come backsince he first went in.
 The insects had also detectedsomething strange and emerged.
 Can you use your Byakuganto look inside?
 There’s some kind of powerful forcethat’s getting in the way.
 So all we can do is watch here?
 Does this mean that allwe can do is believe in him and wait?
 Next time: "The Supposed Sealed Ability"

script:
Connecting old wordsthat have been used up
 I just want to conveymy simple thoughts
 That day's faint wind blows away
 at the castle ruins of yesterday
 I'll laugh with youand live for the moment
 Still that incidentwill continue to trouble you, right?
 That's why it must be good-bye
 Leaving nothing behind,let us share what is left
 In time, we'll realizethat it was everything
 And sadness will touch our cheeks,creating a river of tears
 Trembling thoughts swept into a vortexand melting away
 The Beast Within
 Sasuke!
 Why…?!
 Why do you run away?!
 Sasuke!
 Don’t…
 be staring at…
 people!
 He’s faster than earlier!
 The medicine from earlier…
 Was there some kind ofspecial ingredient in it or something…?
 Not…bad…
 Moving around kind of…made me feel super weird…
 Oh, my…!
 What was that…all of a sudden…?
 Did he really…fall asleep…?
 You fell for it, eh?!
 It looked like I was sleeping,but actually I wasn’t!
 This is the Shinobi secret…!
 Guy Sensei…I did it!
 Guy Sensei…I…I…
 You fell for it yet again, huh?!Hey!
 You’re sorely mistakenif you think I’m the kind of person
 to sleep spread-eaglein a place like this!
 I…I…
 What…? What am I doingin a place like this…?
 What…?
 Why…? Why…?
 Alcohol…?
 He’s just drunk, huh…?
 If so…I’ll send you to another worldbefore you can even feel pain…
 Damn it…I don’t have enough Chakra…
 At this rate…
 As might be expected,things will get hairy
 if I stay in the water any longerwith this wound…
 Why won’t it hit?!
 And here I was sleeping comfortably…
 You’re a buzzing, annoying fly!
 Hey! Bring it on! Hey c’mon…I’ll show you…
 What’re…those movements…?
 As you know, in that technique…
 one gets stronger the more one drinksand the more one gets drunk.
 I know…
 At the restaurant before…
 When Lee mistook it for waterand drank a small cup of alcohol…
 It took Neji and me, the both of us,to finally…be able to overpower Lee.
 You couldn’t restrain him yourself…?
 I could overpower himif I was fighting him as an enemy…
 But well, I couldn’t inflict a serious injuryon my beloved student…
 That’s right…
 That’s how it wasjust with one small cup, so…
 If he were to drinkan entire bottle of alcohol…
 An invincible strength, huh…?
 But it’s just afterhe got out of the hospital.
 How long will his bodyhold on for…?
 A Loopy Fist User, huh…?lt’s my first time seeing one…
 If you’re not going to come…then I’ll go!
 His attacks are straight as usual…
 Oh!
 Ouch!
 It’s your fault!
 I…I…!
 I’m enjoying my youth!
 He’s too unorthodox…
 And most of all…he’s fast!
 Right in the middle of my youth…
 Dance of the Camellia!
 Here!
 I can’t read his movements…
 An attack on me…That’s quite some Taijutsu…
 I have no choice…
 My attack ability is bones…
 You heard that earlierfrom the Clone brat, right…?
 I’ll sober you up right away.
 I’m…not drunk…or anything!
 Then I’ll wake you up!
 I’m not drunk or anything!
 In the first place, I’m a minor!
 Minors shouldn’t drink at all!
 Unorthodox, isn’t it…?This is my Kekkei Genkai.
 Calm down…Think of a strategy…
 Seek…some kind of possibility…
 Humph. With that wound…
 It seems he wasn’t ableto escape very far at all…
 This is my limit…I can’t move…
 Damn it…He’s already caught up?
 And…
 My head’s pounding…
 And what’s with this wound…?
 It seems I was drunk, eh…?
 Your appearance…!
 It seems you’ve sobered up…This is my Kekkei Genkai…
 Kekkei Genkai…
 My Kekkei Genkai freely controlsosteoblastic and osteoclastic cells…
 It even controls the concentrationof calcium. It's an ability to form bones.
 Basically, there are over two hundredbones in the human body…
 But for me, that’s not a set number.
 But bones are bones, after all!
 If they break, they break!
 Wh-What a hardness…!
 Are these really human bones…?!
 If so…!
 Larch Dance.
 I’ve had it…
 A little more…you clod.
 It’s not like the time before with Asuma…
 A-Asuma!
 There’s probably zero possibilityof someone coming to help...
 Hey, what’s the point of thinkingabout someone helping…?!
 Calm down!
 The smell is moving away…
 I’m saved…
 Who is?
 How…?!
 I knew it…
 My coat?!
 It seems you didn’t notice your own smellthat you’re routinely used to smelling…
 With that you erased your own smell?
 You understand well the attributes of scent.lt figures why I didn’t smell you.
 And…as would be expected,
 it’s tough having you guys split up in twoto search for me…
 Damn it…
 Please wait!
 The real deal…is from now!
 My role now is to stall this personas long as possible…
 So, I should’ve avoided a big techniquethat could be self-defeating…
 But it seems this isn’t an opponenteasy enough to be able to beat
 without using my Secret Technique…
 Here I go!
 I just had surgeryand am not at my best.
 But if it’d just be opening the first of theEight Inner Gates, The Gate of Opening,
 I should somehow…
 The first gate… Gate of Opening…
 Open!
 Primary Lotus!
 The impact of the kickwas suppressed by the bones…?!
 That’s some speed… But it’s over.
 Damn it… No matter how much I think,I can’t come up with any good strategies!
 I’ve had it…can’t hold any further…
 With me right in front of you,you can’t even howl like a loser…?
 Eh?!
 Die!
 You’re mine!
 Don’t you be smilingbefore you’re going to die!
 What?!
 Who’re you?!
 Heh… It seemsyou’re an ally this time…
 Who’re you?!
 A Sand…
 Shinobi…
 ally of the Leaf!
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 And you smiled
 For the first time, I was able to speak
 In my own words
 Would you think it wasa bother if I approached you?
 Despite my doubts,I worked up my courage
 My clumsy attempts with words
 You listened without turning away
 No wonder I get carried away by you
 But you don’t feel anything for me, do you?
 I feel so sad
 But…
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 And you smiled
 For the first time, I was able to speak
 In my own words
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 And you smiled
 For the first time, I was able to speak
 In my own words
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 I heard that the Sand and Leafhad made up, but…
 It wasn’t that we attacked the Leaf Villagefor the fun of it.
 It was just a mission, same as this time.
 Humph! I see.
 By the way, weren’t you threeheaded this way together?
 We had no choice.Since you guys are weak…
 Idiot. Don’t take them lightly.These guys are out of the ordinary.
 Next episode,“The Sand Shinobi: Allies of the Leaf”

script:
Connecting old wordsthat have been used up
 I just want to conveymy simple thoughts
 That day's faint wind blows away
 at the castle ruins of yesterday
 I'll laugh with youand live for the moment
 Still that incidentwill continue to trouble you, right?
 That's why it must be good-bye
 Leaving nothing behind,let us share what is left
 In time, we'll realizethat it was everything
 And sadness will touch our cheeks,creating a river of tears
 Trembling thoughts swept into a vortexand melting away
 Sasuke!
 Are you going torun away from me?!
 Yo…loser.
 A Cry on Deaf Ears
 It’s you this time, huh?
 I couldn’t do it.I was not able to stop Sasuke…
 I think…the one who can stop Sasuke…
 the one who can save Sasuke is…
 Naruto…you are the only one.
 Naruto…this is my…once in a lifetime…favor to ask…
 Please… Please bring Sasuke back!
 I also told this to Sakura, but…
 Don’t mind me anymore.
 What's with that face?
 Iruka Sensei, why on the earthdoes an outstanding person like me
 have to be on the same team with him?
 Sasuke graduated withthe highest grade out of all students…
 Naruto, you are at the bottom!
 When you even outthe team’s strength,
 then it naturally becomes like this.
 Try your best not to slow me down,you dunce.
 I am fine without eating!I am absolutely fine.
 I’m…fine…
 Here.
 You asked Sakura for a hint the other day,what did she tell you?
 Shall we go?
 Yup.
 Wh-What’s with that face…?
 You loser…
 Why…?
 You… I hated you, you know.
 It’s none of your business!
 Who knows,my body moved on its own.
 You rescue Sakura, no matter what!
 Sasuke… You…
 I could still distract him for a little while…
 I lost everything once.
 I don’t want to see my precious comradesdie in front of me anymore.
 Why…?
 Why is it…Sasuke?
 Why did you become like this?!
 You!
 Whatever happens to me,what does that have to do with you?
 I have my own way.
 No matter who it is,
 nobody has the rightto tell me what to do.
 I will tell you the truth.
 I’m done fooling around withyou guys of the Leaf.
 Go home.
 I’ll take care of him!
 Choji…
 Go everyone!
 Go, quickly! I’ll catch up with you.
 Neji…
 Okay!
 Hold on!
 Kiba…
 Kiba! Akamaru!
 Now! Naruto!
 Shikamaru…
 The strategy…a success!
 What are you doing?Please go quickly!
 You also promised Sakurawith a Nice-Guy pose, Naruto.
 Bushy Brow…
 I’ll defeat this person.
 It’s a promise.
 Everyone…
 Everyone risked their livesto come after you, you know!
 Good job for them.
 Lastly, I will tell youthe most important thing.
 Sasuke is neither a close friendof mine nor is he someone I like.
 But Sasuke is a Shinobi ofthe Village Hidden in the Leaves…
 A comrade.
 That’s why we will rescue himby risking our lives.
 This is the Leaf way.
 How do you takeyour comrades of the Leaf ?!
 Comrades, you said…
 Did I become stronger stayingwith those so-called comrades?
 I am going to where Orochimaru is.
 Orochimaru is the person who killedthe Third Hokage
 and tried to crush The Leaf Village!
 Do you think he willgive you the power freely?
 He just wants your bodyas a vessel!
 You might not be able to come back.You might get killed.
 You think I’d easily let yougo to such a place?!
 That doesn’t matter to me…
 If my goal is accomplished,then that’s all that matters.
 If you intend to get in that way…
 Then it can’t be helped…
 You’re not gonna be able to!I’ll take you back even by force!
 Why are you laughing?!
 You were laughing at that time too.
 That time…?
 What’s funny?
 It’s not funny. I am happy.
 Thinking about…how I can finally defeat you here.
 That time you wanted to fight me, right?
 You were thrilled weren’t you?
 At first!
 But, you were different.
 That was…
 Hurry up and come.
 But first, put on your Headband.I’ll wait.
 I don’t need such a thing…
 Just put it on!
 You won’t be able toput one scratch on my face.
 That’s not it!
 I’m saying that this is a signthat we fight as equal Leaf Shinobi.
 That is what I call a stuck up!
 You think you and I are equal?
 Yeah, I think so.
 I’ve never thought I was inferior to you.
 You’re so obnoxious!
 Stop!
 That was…
 That was not the kind of fight I wanted.
 Even now…this is not…
 I don’t care aboutyour circumstances.
 What…is this power?
 Power is flowing out…
 So this is the power thatthe guy was talking about.
 Furthermore, the poweris growing into my body.
 If it is like that now…if I release this curse mark…
 I wonder how much power…
 Wh-What power…
 He’s not the same as before…
 Wake up already!
 I awakened long ago…
 From my idiotic self who dreams abouta lax peaceful future…
 hanging out with comrades.
 That’s why I left the village!
 That’s why I sought power!
 My dream is not in the future.
 My dream is in the past…
 That’s the only place it exists.
 Wow, Brother!
 You hit the target right in the middle,even the one behind the rock!
 All right, me too!
 Sasuke, let’s go home.
 Geez… You said thatyou would teach me a new shuriken jutsu.
 There is an important mission tomorrowand I need to prepare for that.
 Liar…
 Forgive me, Sasuke…Another time.
 Brother, watch me!
 Hey! If you push yourself…
 Why is the one who twistedhis ankle laughing?
 Could it be that you are tryingto take the easy way?
 That’s not true...
 I’m happy thinking about
 how I’m finally going tothe Academy starting tomorrow.
 I’m going to do my bestwhen I enter the Academy.
 So even that father will approve of me.
 He will count on melike he does on my brother…
 Sasuke… You really are…
 I told you…
 I don’t need a futurewith you guys anymore.
 Fire Style: Dragon Flame Jutsu.
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 And you smiled
 For the first time, I was able to speak
 In my own words
 Would you think it wasa bother if I approached you?
 Despite my doubts,I worked up my courage
 My clumsy attempts with words
 You listened without turning away
 No wonder I get carried away by you
 But you don’t feel anything for me, do you?
 I feel so sad
 But…
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 And you smiled
 For the first time, I was able to speak
 In my own words
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 And you smiled
 For the first time, I was able to speak
 In my own words
 For the first time, I spoke to you
 I feel power surgingthrough my body…
 It's as though I can't lose.
 It's power I'd never have gainedplaying comrade with you guys from Leaf.
 But it's not enough.lt's way short of enough, Naruto!
 Strength…hatred…and desire!
 Next episode: "Brothers: Distance Among the Uchiha"

script:
Rock away your existence,
 Shouting that you are here…
 A new journey begins now.
 As we survived throughthe changing seasons,
 we gained knowledge and strength,(just looks like a survival game)
 But the forgotten memories,
 of the feelings abandoned withinthe flows of time,
 have also been lost.
 When sinking down,we learned loneliness.
 But now we’ve met each other,we are no longer alone.
 Unveil your feelings,Those high emotions
 Those tears will change your fate.
 Pound your heartbeatagainst the darkness,
 We’re sure to meet,Under the same flag of pain
 It looks likethe preparations are complete.
 So this is the Land of Greensyou were talking about, brother?
 Well, it’s a small land,
 but it could be a good stepping-stonefor getting ahead in the world.
 We’ve already bought offhalf of the public officials.
 This land will be overturnedon our signal.
 As of today,we’re the feudal lords of this land.
 Feudal lords, huh…?
 That has a nice ring to it.
 Open for Business!The Leaf Moving Service
 This is a problem…
 I thought about testing outvarious combinations, but it backfired.
 With these remaining members,there’s nobody who can take the lead…
 But it’s merchant protection this time,
 so no matter who goes,there probably isn’t much to worry about.
 Mission difficulty isn’t the issue.
 It’s a commission fromthe Land of Greens.
 I wanted to send thema respectable team.
 The lord of the castle therewas good to me in the old days!
 True indeed…
 He generously assumed the debtsfor the bundle you blew on gambling.
 It’s small,but it’s a nice and easygoing land.
 There was an adorable princess,and two boy Ninja looked after her…
 At that time,they both said they’d marry me…
 I wonder if they still feel that way…
 I don’t think so.
 I bet they’ve all gotten big…
 We’ll be at the border soon.
 This is our last look at this sceneryfor a while.
 All right!A mission, a mission!
 Wait up, Naruto!
 Everyone else was off on missions,
 but I've been doing nothing butodd jobs in the village!
 I was sick of hearing storiesabout everyone’s adventures.
 Still,we’re guarding merchants this time.
 It ‘s probably not somethingto brag about.
 Then I should exaggeratethe story a bit
 and say that I took outabout a thousand bandits, right?
 That’s just lying…
 Oh! There they are.That’s them!
 Yahoo!
 Who’re you?
 You guys are merchantsfrom the Land of Greens, right?
 That’s right.
 We’ve come fromthe Village Hidden in Leaves
 to protect you guys.Believe it.
 The Village Hidden in Leaves?
 See…? 					This, this.
 We were told to protect youfrom mountain bandits…
 It’s for certain.
 I’m Naruto Uzumaki.
 And this is Hinata.
 I’m Choji Akimichi.
 Um, we received one more itemfrom the Hokage
 to identify ourselves with.
 Hey, Momiji.
 Give it back.
 Oh, it’s true.
 These people are fromthe Village of the Hidden Leaf.
 See…?74.01	01:30:15:10	01:30:17:11	The Leaf Moving Service
 Wh-What’s that?
 Old lady Tsunade…she’s done it this time!
 I see.
 I’m Kikusuke.
 This is Yurinoshin.
 He’s Shun.
 I’m Momiji!We’ll be counting on you movers!
 You sure eat a lot.
 That’s why you're so f…
 Fa?!
 …full figured.
 For you.
 I love people with great strength.
 Something like this is a cinch.
 See? Watch.
 Roll-roll-roll-roll-roll-roll-roll…
 Somebody help me!
 That Choji, getting all carried away.
 Move faster, mover.
 We’re rapidly falling behind.
 We’re not movers, I’m telling you.
 Why don’t you help outbefore complaining?!
 No, it’s fine.
 Our cousin Shun is in poor health.
 You don’t need to worry,Kikusuke, Yurinoshin.
 I had no intention oflistening to anything
 this good-for-nothing has had to sayfrom the start.
 Who’s a good-for-nothing?!Just you watch!
 Honestly,it’s because you push yourself too far…
 I’m sorry…Shun’s being unreasonable.
 Water! 					Oh.
 Mine’s empty, too.
 Then there’s some fresh drawn water.
 Here!
 Wow,how’d you find water in a place like this?
 My grandma taught me.
 Your grandma?
 It's this…
 You can tell with this.
 What?! 					With those?
 It’s called dousing.
 If you concentrateon the item you’re looking for…
 these rods will react to that itemand will inform you when you're near it.
 It’s knowledge passed onfrom our predecessors.
 When I get back to the village,
 maybe I'll try to find moneythat people dropped with that.
 Tasty!
 It doesn’t compare to the waterin the Land of Greens, but it's good water.
 Come to think of it,what kind of place is the Land of Greens?
 The Land of Greens is…a small land deep in the mountains.
 Everyone in the land loves natureand is warm-hearted.
 It was indeed Shangri-La…
 Was…?
 Oh, it’s nothing…
 But, you know, if it’s such a great place,why do you need protection?
 It’s targeted becausethe people take peace for granted!
 What do you mean by that?
 Stuff like loving natureand being warm-hearted sounds nice.
 But the bottom line is that the peoplein the Land of Greens are all softhearted.
 We live in a troubled time now.
 Something like believing in peopleis ridiculous.
 Hey, the Land of Greensis not something to speak ill of like that.
 The lord of the castle there was kindeven to us merchants passing through.
 To think he’d take up that kind of attitudewith an old lady…
 He’s kind of disagreeable.
 He’s your cousin, right?Do something about him.
 R-Right.
 He’s probably a bit touchyfrom the bad things that have happened.
 I’m sorry…
 Oh, i-it’s okay…
 Hey, that’s dangerous.
 It’s dangerousto wander around alone.
 Brother Choji, look at that…
 Naruto!
 What is it?
 That.
 Wh-What is that?
 That’s in the direction ofthe Land of Greens, right?!
 I’m going to go check it out…You take the others and go on ahead.
 I’ll be right back.
 Listen.
 What we saw here is a secret.
 We don’t want everyone to get worried.
 Yeah. 					Got it.
 Huh? Where’s Naruto?
 Th-The bathroom…
 I’ll give this to youif you tell me what you saw earlier.
 Black smoke… 					was rising.
 Black smoke…?! 					From where?
 The direction of the Land of Greens.
 Lord Shun…
 It’s finally…
 I should be at the Land of Greensborder pretty soon.
 Wh-What was that …?There was no presence at all.
 Who’re you guys!
 Who’re you guys?
 That headband. You’re withthe Hidden Leaf Village, right?
 So what if I am?Why are you targeting me?
 I have no intentionof fighting you guys.
 It seems the ones we are looking forare heading this direction, you see.
 Those who prowl around here will die.
 Did we do it…?
 The Substitution Jutsu?!
 The real one is over here!
 These guys are pretty good.
 Two left.
 One of them is the real one!
 What?!
 Too bad!Those two are also clones.
 I’m going to turn back for now…
 Choji! Hinata!
 How’d it go, Naruto?
 Actually, there’s trouble…
 Guys! Let’s take a break herefor the time being!
 Pursuers from the Land of Greens?
 They said that…
 The ones they were looking forwere headed in this direction.
 But why would Ninjabe after this group?
 These people are just merchants,aren’t they?
 And they’re not even peoplefrom the Land of Greens to begin with…
 Now that you mention it,that’s right.
 But what will we do?
 We’re going to engage them if they come,of course.
 That might be impossible…
 We have elderly peopleand children with us.
 You’re right…
 I know.
 It could be thatthey’re not chasing after us!
 What do you mean by that?
 Basically, we’re movingin the same direction as their true target
 and we could just bein their battle ground…or something.
 I see.
 That means if we clear the path,they’ll let us go right by.
 Alright.
 Listen up, guys!
 Some kind of troublesome guysare heading this way.
 Troublesome guys?
 Naruto, I think everyone will feel anxiousif you say it like that.
 I-I see…
 But you don’t need to worry.
 They’re probably not after us…
 It’ll kind of be the long way around,
 but we’ll make it throughif we take a little side turn up ahead.
 Does this feudal lord really have this little?
 He’s a feudal lordwho’s a prestigious ruler of virtue.
 So he would never line his pockets.
 But we’ll squeeze out a big pilefrom now on.
 More importantly, hasthe young girl in question been found?
 Nope…
 But the two who were tracking hergot attacked.
 We know the direction she fled in.
 That young girl just would not be good.
 If they get away, they may returnwith forces from other lands.
 If the sun were a little stronger,
 I could burned down a whole mountainwith my Jutsu…
 Then I’ll go…
 Lord Renga, I gathered all collaboratorsin the hall as you ordered…
 Oh, good work.
 Without your guys’ help, we couldn’t havebrought down the castle this easily …
 Then brother,shall we go for the hall greeting?
 Okay… I’ll take care of things here.
 So, about the thing you promised…
 Oh, that’s right.
 Take as much there as you like.
 Really?
 Honestly. It’s so easy to deceivesofthearted people…
 It really is exactly so.
 Our lord believed in usuntil the very end…
 Come on.
 If you stuff that much in there,the ferry on death’s river will sink.
 I make it a habit not to believe in people.
 Especially peoplewho have betrayed someone once…
 Y-You’re joking, Lord Renga…
 It’s no joke.
 C-Could it be that you had megather the collaborators in the coup to…
 You’re also softhearted!
 That should do it.
 Yurinojou, it seems they’re after us.
 Yes.
 I leave Lady Haruna to you.
 What are you going to do?
 If we wait here for their attack,there will be too many to defend.
 Since it’s come to this,I’ll slow them down.
 But according to the information,
 they are three Janinwho use unknown Jutsu.
 I know.
 But my Jutsu will not be defeatedby the likes of them.
 Very well.
 Go, Kikunojou.
 Yes, Lady Haruna.
 Naruto.
 I set a trap for the time being.
 Jeez, Hinata.You’re such a worrywart.
 You don’t need to go that far.
 Huh? Yurinoshin,where’s Kikusuke?
 You’re right. 					Since when…?
 Oh, he had some other businessand went on ahead…
 Say what? Taking liberties like thatis really a problem…
 Oh, I see.
 So that’s it, huh?
 What is it?
 Even Kikusuke makes sureto go to the bathroom.
 Naruto…!
 Lady Haruna, I shall protect you with my life!
 There!
 Who’re you…?!
 I’m Ruiga.
 To think you’djust come right on out nonchalantly.
 Then she must in that group, right?
 If it’s one against one,I won’t lose to a hired Ninja like you!
 Can you do it?
 Have a taste ofthe Land of Greens’ Flower Ninja Art!
 Eat this! Flower Shuriken!Flying Flowers: Falling Foliage!
 Too easy…
 I don’t know about that!
 Flower Ninja Art: Release!Myriad of Flowers!
 Ninja Art: Mirror Flower Water Moon!
 Flowers made of Letter Bombs, huh?Futile, futile!
 And Genjutsu next, huh?
 This is the finishing blow.
 Flower Ninja Art: Bloom!Myriad of Flowers!
 Too bad.
 The Ninjutsu of a Flower Ninjacan’t beat me.
 Now it’s my turn!
 Eat this.
 Water Style: Liquid Memory!
 Yesterday’s Call Sign,was all from my cell phone.
 In a strange park,I play the Fuzz Guitar without enthusiasm.
 Yellow Moon.
 Even now, counting to three,I open my eyes
 Shadow Moon I am still dreaming.
 Look at my eyes, look at my eyes,as we face one another’s back
 Look at my eyes, when can we meet?
 EveryDay EveryNightWith every word I can think of
 Right away, my messy feelings as is,
 A magical chord change, in a restless city
 A daily JAZZ Guitar playedin a soft minor key
 A running-ramen strategy, huh?
 In other words, we split upin order to avoid annihilation, right?
 With this,the protection burden will decrease.
 But won’t the soup spill if it runs?
 This is an example.
 It’d still be troubleeven if it’s just an example, believe it.
 Then, let’s make itthe running-ramen-with-a-lid strategy.
 If you say so, Naruto.
 I mean, do you really understandthe strategy, Naruto?
 Next time:“Mystery of the Targeted Merchants.”
